string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_HALLOWEEN2011_LIGHT
string.body: Castings;The Occult High yearbook, which the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Shulackwizard_Light_99_n]s and other monsters have run off with, to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Blair]'s consternation.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_HALLOWEEN2011_DARK
string.body: Castings;The Occult High yearbook, which the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Shulackwizard_Dark_99_n]s and other monsters have run off with, to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Witchta]'s consternation.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_WINTER2011_FOOD_HPREGEN_20A
string.body: Stunned Potcrab;Fight and subdue a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_15_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_25_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_35_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_45_An]--whichever provides a good challenge for your level.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_WINTER2011_FOOD_MPREGEN_20A
string.body: Stunned Starcrab;Fight and subdue a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Starcrab_15_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Starcrab_25_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Starcrab_35_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Starcrab_45_An]--whichever provides a good challenge for your level.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80128A
string.body: Mysterious Reian Herb;The herb a particular Reian Tribesman has given to his [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_AncientClanFi_LIGHT_99_n]s so that they can go forth and make crab cakes. Supposedly, they make the best crab cakes on Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80129A
string.body: Reian Rations;The strange Reian food which [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_AncientClanFi_DARK_99_n]s carry so that they won't be tempted by the tasty crab cakes. One supposes that these are vegetarian, or at least don't contain crab.

string.name: STR_DIC_Q30459_All
string.body: Materials for the Ring;Materials needed for a ring that [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF4a_01] designed. He hopes it will win [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF4a_02]'s heart. This exotic list includes [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410A], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410B], and the Finest Accessory Flux.

string.name: STR_DIC_Q30410_All
string.body: Transformation Materials;Items [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF4a_01] requested, including [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410A], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410B], and Finest Accessory Flux. She believes they can help her alter her physical form.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q19048A
string.body: Andreas' Manual;Andreas, a Preceptor of Emotion, lent you this book to help you learn how to be more expressive. Double-click to read.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q29048A
string.body: Seriphim's Manual;Seriphim, a Preceptor of Emotion, lent you this book to help you learn how to be more expressive. Double-click to read.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_PVP_01
string.body: Courage Insignia;A reward the Crucible Coliseum gives to new contestants.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11060a
string.body: Violet Orb;An orb containing Kaisinel's orders. Defeat Omega and complete Omega's Fragment's first quest to receive more missions from the Violet Orb.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21060a
string.body: Shining Scroll;A scroll containing Marchutan's orders. Defeat Ragnarok and complete the Shining Scroll's first quest to receive more missions from the Shining Scroll.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_01
string.body: Crucible Insignia;A reward that the Empyrean Crucible and Crucible Challenge give to trainees.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80134a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Hero Spirits and Mage Spirits in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09_1] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80134b
string.body: Elyos Soul Fragment;The Soil Spirits and Ironjaw Sparkles in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09_1] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80134c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Sprigg Outlaws and Ice Slinks in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09_1]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80136a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Vigilante Spirits and Healer Spirits wandering around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80136b
string.body: Elyos Soul Fragment;The Grove Sylphens and Fluorescent Sparkies around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80136c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Armour Wing Sparkles and Munmun Gatherers near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80138a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Spriggle Gatherers and Malek Drakes at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80138b
string.body: Elyos Soul Fragment;The Silver Granker Fawns and Sawteeth Jaw Sparkles at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80138c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Strong Tipolids and Glacier Crasaurs wandering around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80140a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box[pl:"Boxes"];A box that you can receive from the Frostspirit Healers and Frostspirit Shamans roaming the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80140b
string.body: Elyos Soul Fragment;The Frost Granker Fawns and Cornhead Sylphens wandering the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_A]drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80140c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Obsidian Kirrins and Obstinate Abexes wandering the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2B_SZ_A]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80142a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Veteran Tursin Healers and Tempest Spirits of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80142b
string.body: Asmodian Soul Fragment;The Leaf Plumas and Earth Spirits of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80142c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Contaminated Sylphens and Aqueous Spirits of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80144a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Anubite Seekers and Wounded Ghosts around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80144b
string.body: Asmodian Soul Fragment;The Redthroat Crestliches and Bighorn Bakus around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80144c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from Roaring Monitors and Wasteland Drakies around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_OP]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80146a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Black Spotted Clodworms and Virago Robbers on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF3A] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80146b
string.body: Asmodian Soul Fragment;The Steelback Ksellids and Violeteye Sylphens on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF3A] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80146c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Horned Tipolids and Mamut the Gigantic on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF3A]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80148a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Gladiator Spirits and the Ancient Dark Spirits of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A1] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80148b
string.body: Asmodian Soul Fragment;The Trained Tipolids and Desert Bakus of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A1] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80148c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Salt Protrusion Starcrabs and Wasteland Abexes of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_A1]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ARENA_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_40A
string.body: Broken Crucible Mark;A sad-looking token with chipped corners. You can win one by completing Level 3 of the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ARENA_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_50A
string.body: Shining Crucible Mark;A token that shines like a mirror. You can win one by completing Level 7 of the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ARENA_SCROLL_SPEED_RUN_50A
string.body: Faded Crucible Mark;A token that has faded in the sun. You can win one by completing Level 2 of the Crucible Challenge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ARENA_SCROLL_SPEED_FLY_50A
string.body: Sparkling Crucible Mark;A shiny new sparkling token. You can win one by completing Level 4 of the Crucible Challenge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_world_event_webshop_01a
string.body: Pilit Headband;A headband decorated with joyous spring flowers. Free in the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_world_event_webshop_02a
string.body: Brax Gloves;Warm, strong gloves made of Brax leather. Free in the [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10060b
string.body: Eye of Observation;A material vital for the construction of a Vigilance Core. You can get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_Monster_M_Flyingeye]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10063a
string.body: Incarnation's Claw;The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Tiamat_Crystal_Named_60_Af]'s massive scimitar-shaped talons, fine as razors. You can also get them by accepting [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LDF4b_10]'s request.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_18703g
string.body: Marvellous Aether;Uniquely powerful Aether contained within the [%dic:STR_DIC_FOBJ_IDRaksha_mandali].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_18707A
string.body: Runeseal Stone;A stone infused by powerful magics, possessed by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRaksha_02_DrakanMirrorNmd_60_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRaksha_03_DrakanFiremage_Nmd_60_Ae]. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Raksha] was imprisoned with similar power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_18711A
string.body: Paruam's Iris;A gooey bit of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRaksha_4F_Evileye_Nmd_57_Ae]'s eye. Gee, won't the other Daevas be impressed?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10051A
string.body: Magic Core;A material carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_IronGolem_57_An]s. The [%dic:STR_DIC_ILDF4a_FOBJ_Q10051] uses this material to channel its power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10053B
string.body: Power Crystal;Crystals that help [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Oriatia] maintain her formidable power, which have been stolen by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C1_Elementalking_Cristal_57_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11507A
string.body: Special Lunch Box;Not only does this lunch taste best when it is fresh, but it is more nutritious as well.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11516A
string.body: Polished Crystal Ball;Some [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_calydon_fam] Calydon carry these glossy crystal spheres.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11517A
string.body: Jotun Record Plate;A stone plate decoding the secrets of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B2_09] Jotun.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20051A
string.body: Wave Battery;A potential power source for the [%dic:STR_DIC_ILDF4a_FOBJ_Q10051], carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackFi_57_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackRa_57_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21508A
string.body: Petralith Piece;A chunk of old Petralith that contains a key piece of technology. The rumour is that a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_calydon_fam] [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Tog_57_An] accidentally ate it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21510A
string.body: Hard Fruit;The bitter, mealy fruit of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A4_Worm_Oasis_56_An] that grows in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_A1] oasis.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21515A
string.body: Strigik Claw;The longest talon of a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_ldf4a_Owllau_fam] Strigik. They are impressively sharp, and sometimes used to tip Reian spears.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41161A
string.body: Tough Brax Meat;Meat from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A1_Brax_DR_56_n]. This is a major component of the Redscale Hornskull's diet.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41164A
string.body: Herbivorous Drana;This Drana contains the concentrated nutrients of plants. It can be found in areas of concetrated vegetable decay, such as [%dic:STR_DIC_FOBJ_soil_Q41164].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41165A
string.body: Carnivorous Drana;This Drana is condensed from the nutrients in an animal's body. It occurs especially in corpses of [%dic:STR_DIC_FOBJ_halfcorpse]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41171A
string.body: Shulack Combat Uniform;A standard uniform for [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackFi_57_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_ShulackRa_57_An]s, emphasizing practicality and durability.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41175A
string.body: Mamut Meat;A fresh, thick cut of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_mammoth_DR_57_An]. The meat is marbled with plenty of fat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41201A
string.body: Glowing Marble;This marble contains the light of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightM_57_An] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_ElementalLightF_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41216A
string.body: Zayedan's Record;A mysterious device that stores information on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Oriatia].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41251A
string.body: Engraving Fragment;An engraving lovingly etched by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Moraytia]'s husband, which she treasured until the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C1_Bookie_Crk_58_An] broke it and stole its fragments.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41256A
string.body: Relic Fragment;Strange artefacts unearthed by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_C1_000]'s heavings. They must have had some purpose, though it's no longer clear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41262A
string.body: Siel's Grail;A mysterious relic whose origin is lost to history. It could be vital to beating the Balaur, or some sort of land cultivation device, or just rusty old junk.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41268A
string.body: Hornskull's Backbone;The vertebrae from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C2_SalivadoRed_58_An]. Simmered with chersnips, it makes a rich, oily broth.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41269A
string.body: Pagati Shank;The leg of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C2_Drakanstrider_wild_58_An]. Pagati is a lean, tough meat, so this cut is best braised.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41302A
string.body: Pagati Egg;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_D_Drakanstrider_wild_58_An] incubate two to three eggs at a time, but it is rare for more than one to hatch.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41304A
string.body: Pagati Call;This flute mimics the sound of a mother Pagati calling her offspring.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41351A
string.body: Reversed Drakan Scale;Some [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q41351all_1_1] have these mutated scales, which look similar to normal Balaur scales but have a duller sheen.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_41168A
string.body: Note Written in Blood;A note carried by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A2_DragonFly_57_An]. It may help you locate the missing Reian.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41504a
string.body: Crushing Seed;A tiny grain of potent magic carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_Skeletonre_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41512a
string.body: Supplies;These supplies were in shiny metallic containers, so perhaps that is why the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_Dionaea_58_An] stole them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41520a
string.body: Transfiguration Fragment;An enchanted stone held by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Guardian_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41528a
string.body: Frightcorn Filter;The porous stalk of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_Corn_Spring_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41530a
string.body: Transformation Stone;If used at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_S9], it can transform nearby Dragonbound into Ribbits.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41532a
string.body: Edible Meat;Apparently even ugly creatures like the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_Varanus_Spring_58_An]s are still made out of meat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41539a
string.body: Satra's Insignia;A mark of honour that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Dragon_General_Named_60_Ae] wears around his neck.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41540a
string.body: Powerful Aether Marble;A small, cloudy marble containing Aether energy. It resonates with the energy in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T4_A2] area, creating a frequency that can shatter certain kinds of crystal.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41543a
string.body: Caltrops Thorn;Short, curved thorns that grow beneath the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C1_Mimic_57_An]'s leaves.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41543b
string.body: Gnarl's Moss;This thin, spongy moss grows on the branches of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C1_Xipeto_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41544a
string.body: Reian's Hair;The key ingredient in Davikik's magic potion. You can ask [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ioran] for it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41545a
string.body: Transformation Dram;Davikik doesn't quite trust this potion, though he made it himself. Help him test it on other Gurriki before he uses it himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41552a
string.body: Infinite Cage;A cage that's been magically enhanced so that it can contain an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C2_Enos_59_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41553a
string.body: Copper Necklace;A simple necklace given to you by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LDF4b_16]. When dipped in the waters of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S6], it becomes studded with stunning azurine crystals.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41553b
string.body: Glittering Necklace;A necklace transformed from dull to dazzling in the rich waters of the Lapialus Mineral Lake. It's beautiful now, but what would another dip in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_C2_S6] do?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41554a
string.body: Sharp Crystal;A weapons material obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C2_Silika_59_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41556a
string.body: Kunati's Banner;A flag representing the group under [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C3_Dragon_General2_Named_60_Ae]'s command.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41558b
string.body: Astus' Journal;A journal kept by Wily Astus.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ldf4b_questcomp_02
string.body: Trust Marble;A token given by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lumen] to signify his abiding trust in you.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41561a
string.body: Essence of Remorse;You receive this when you defeat [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRaksha_05_Raksha_Nmd_60_Ae] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRaksha_5F_Raksha_Nmd_57_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41562a
string.body: Vine Weapon;Cleverly-fashioned weapons carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumBFi_57_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumGRa_57_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumMFi_57_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_BrohumFRa_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ldf4b_questcomp_01
string.body: Gilded Marble;A token that proves your personal abilities. You may trade these with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gneise] for a Malevite of Power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41564a
string.body: Vasharti's Seal;The seal of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDYun_Nmd_7Named_60_Ah] in Rentus Base.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41565a
string.body: Traitor's Weapon;Weapons used by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Q39515all] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T2_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41565b
string.body: Seal of Fanaticism;A seal given to Followers of the Balaur, who are gathered in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4b_SZ_T3_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41565c
string.body: Glossy Corn;Ears of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Fungy_Red_60_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Fungy_Blue_60_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Fungus_60_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41572a
string.body: Worg Skin;The thick, luxurious fur from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Monster_Quest_Zaif].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41574a
string.body: Orkanimum Essence;Essence you can capture from the slain [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C2_Silika_59_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ldf4b_weapon_upgrade_01
string.body: Upsorceller;Infused with magical power, this item can instantly upgrade a weapon. Speak to Grais to learn about this process.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ldf4b_weapon_upgrade_02
string.body: Magical Aether Crystal;A powerful crystal held by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lumen], which can instantly upgrade a weapon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ldf4b_weapon_upgrade_03
string.body: Fusion Fragment;Capable of upgrading weapons, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ruaka] sells these in the Rancora Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41584a
string.body: Mookie's Sap[pl:"Saps"];You can obtain this sap by defeating a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_Fungy_58_An]. It makes an ideal cleaning agent.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41592a
string.body: Maintenance Tools;Tools for repairing the Reian Trebuchets. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_S3_DrakanFi_PagatiDrop_Destroy_58_An] have absconded with them, those scandalous reptilian rapscallions.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41594a
string.body: Griffon Egg;An egg gathered from slaying a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_Griffon_Crack_58_An]. Their yolks are bright orange and make impressive omelettes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41596a
string.body: Hard Ore;Ore mined and refined by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_FanaticWorker_58_An]s--an excellent weapons material.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_41597a
string.body: Dragonbound Weapon;A weapon locked in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_Q41597A].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12001a
string.body: Frillneck Rib Chop;A chop cut from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_Frillfaimam_58_An]. The Reians like to pound these chops thin and pan-fry them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12011a
string.body: Zefirun's Mane;The mane of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Unicorn_58_An] in Edendell.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12014a
string.body: Light Bead;A small glowing marble you can get from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_Elementallight_m_spring_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12018a
string.body: Magic Power Crystal;An eerily-glowing crystal you can get from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_YunFi_Ghost_59_An]s. They look substantial, but weigh nothing at all.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_tiamat_banner_01
string.body: Legionary's Epaulette;An epaulette carried by Naduka, Basrasa, and Satra Legionaries, along with some Balaur warriors elsewhere in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12024a
string.body: Lindis's Ice Horn;This can be taken from a slain [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C2_Fethlot_59_An]. Though it is horn, it looks like it should be made from ice or crystal.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12026a
string.body: Protectorate Weapons;Weapons obtained by defeating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C3_DrakanFi_Noble_60_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C3_DrakanSc_Noble_60_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C3_DrakanWi_Noble_60_Ae], or [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C3_DrakanCl_Noble_60_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12040a
string.body: Vitality Fragment;Fragments you can find on [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_Fungy_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Sam_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_Xipeto_Rage_58_An], or [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_Twister_Aurora_60_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22010a
string.body: Leaf Leg;The leg of an Edendell [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Spider_Leaf_58_An]. It's shaped like a leaf in order to help camoflage the Arachna.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22012a
string.body: Lava Essence;A fire-filled essence you can sap from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_ElementalFire2_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22014a
string.body: Organ Sac;The slimy, steaming organ sac of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_Starfish_59_An]. Though fascinating to some natural scholars, and appetizing to a crazy few, it's hard to imagine wanting one of these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22018a
string.body: Magic Power Crystal;A crystal carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_YunWi_Ghost_59_An]s that gives off a malevolent aura. They look substantial, but weigh nothing at all.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22023a
string.body: Brax Brisket;The tender brisket cut from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C1_Brax_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22026a
string.body: Protectorate Insignia;Can be obtained by defeating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C3_DrakanFi_Noble_60_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C3_DrakanSc_Noble_60_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C3_DrakanWi_Noble_60_Ae], or [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_C3_DrakanCl_Noble_60_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22001a
string.body: Scolopen Poison;A poison you can take from the stinger of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_Scorpion_Giant_58_An]. It is generally considered best to kill the creature first.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_kahrun_quest_material
string.body: Information Officer's Seal;A seal sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Equous] that indicates the authenticity of Sarpan promotional materials.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Lignt_HouseIllusionGate_G1
string.body: Homeward Bound;This skill opens a corridor leading directly to your front door. You're given this Skillbook when you purchase your first home.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_sad_01
string.body: Vernal Flower Aether Ore;An Aether ore produced by Audria ore, which can be found in Oriel and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_happy_01
string.body: Pyre Spirit Aether Ore;An Aether ore produced by Audria ore, which can be found in Oriel and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_delight_01
string.body: Maple Aether Ore;An Aether ore produced by Audria ore, which can be found in Oriel and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_angry_01
string.body: Ice Aether Ore;An Aether ore produced by Audria ore, which can be found in Oriel and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_scary_01
string.body: Broken Aether Gem;A beautiful Aether gem produced by Audria ore, which can be found in Oriel and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_amazing_01
string.body: Rough Aether Gem;A beautiful Aether gem produced by Audria ore, which can be found in Oriel and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_lonely_01
string.body: Hard Aether Gem;A beautiful Aether gem produced by Audria ore, which can be found in Oriel and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_dailygather_shell_01
string.body: Pearl Whelkus;When essencetapping from fish and shellfish in Oriel, you might find this beautiful, if mostly worthless, pearl.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_dailygather_stone_01
string.body: Aether Meteorite;These mysterious rocks can be found at the core of many veins of ore in Oriel, and can sometimes be recovered by essencetapping.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_dailygather_plant_01
string.body: Cycle Flower;You might find one of these rare flowers that change colour with their gardeners' moods when extracting from plants in Oriel.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_dailygather_shell_d_01
string.body: Pearl Whelkus;These pearls are formed by the sealife in Pernon, and are occasionally recovered through essencetapping from fish and shellfish.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_dailygather_stone_d_01
string.body: Aether Meteorite;Some mineral veins in the Pernon region are formed around these, and you can occasionally recover one when essencetapping from ores.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_dailygather_plant_d_01
string.body: Cycle Flower;A genetic mutation unique to Pernon, these flowers can sometimes be recovered by essencetapping from plants.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_SPRING_01
string.body: Spring Crystal;This crystal forms the heart of the Spring Agrint. When held to the light, it glows the pale green of new leaves. It is exceptionally rare and highly valuable to collectors.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_SUMMER_01
string.body: Summer Crystal;This crystal forms the heart of the Summer Agrint. When held to the light, it glows the deep green of flourishing foliage. It is exceptionally rare and highly valuable to collectors.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_FALL_01
string.body: Fall Crystal;This crystal forms the heart of the Fall Agrint. When held to the light, it glows a rich orange, like a harvest moon. It is exceptionally rare and highly valuable to collectors.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_WINTER_01
string.body: Winter Crystal;This crystal forms the heart of the Winter Agrint. When held to the light, it gives off a spectrum from pale peach to silvery violet, like earliest sunrise. It is exceptionally rare and highly valuable to collectors.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_SPRING_01
string.body: Spring Leaf;A pale-green early leaf that covers the Spring Agrint.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_SUMMER_01
string.body: Summer Leaf;A broad, rich-green leaf that covers the Summer Agrint.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_FALL_01
string.body: Autumn Leaf;A brilliant red leaf that covers the Fall Agrint.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_WINTER_01
string.body: Winter Leaf;A faded-brown, brittle leaf that covers the Winter Agrint.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18812_detail
string.body: Pink Nyanco Statue;1 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_sad_01], 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_scary_01]s, and 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_amazing_01]s are required to craft this statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18813_detail
string.body: Shugo Lad Statue;1 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_happy_01], 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_amazing_01]s and 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_lonely_01]s are required to craft this statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18814_detail
string.body: Sorcerer Sprigg Statue;1 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_delight_01], 10 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_amazing_01]s, 15 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_lonely_01]s, and 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_scary_01]s are required to craft this statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18815_detail
string.body: Whitebeard Manduri Statue;1 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_angry_01], 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_lonely_01]s, and 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_scary_01]s are required to craft this statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18816_detail
string.body: Leaves of Four Seasons;Leaves collected from Seasonal Agrints: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_SPRING_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_SUMMER_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_FALL_01], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_WINTER_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18817_detail
string.body: Crystals of Four Seasons;Crystals collected from Seasonal Agrints: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_SPRING_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_SUMMER_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_FALL_01], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_WINTER_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_ILDF4a_FOBJ_Q41304
string.body: Minced Brax Meat;Brax and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_D_SandShark_58_An] meats minced fine enough for a juvenile Pagati. In the wild, mother Pagatis regurgitate something similar to this for their young to eat.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Dandelion_Big
string.body: Giant Astriclox;Gigantic Astriclox flowers grow in the Wildflower Field. If jostled, their fluffy seeds split off and float away.

string.name: STR_DIC_N_LDF4a_Dandelion_Small
string.body: Astriclox Seed;This seed is tufted with dense white fluff, big enough to carry off a person if the wind is strong.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_18306All_1
string.body: Technological Prize;The personal belongings of a Sky Fortress worker, possibly containing Kaichin Engineering secrets. Workers who carry these include [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemFi_Worker_58_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemKn_Worker_58_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemFi_Test_58_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_ShulackFi_58_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_ShulackPr_58_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11511_bottle
string.body: Deadly Poisonous Pollen;The pollen of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_A3_Dionae_DR_57_An]. It looks ordinary enough, but if ingested it can cause powerful hallucinations and even death.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_IDStation_FOBJ_S_BOX
string.body: Popuchin's Document Chest;A chest in which [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShulackFlight_NM_58_An] keeps important documents regarding the Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_18302A
string.body: Sky Fortress Blueprint;A detailed blueprint of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDStation_SZ_Station], which [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_ShulackFlight_NM_58_An] keeps safe.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21506_1
string.body: Feena Box;A box expected by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_01] that contains much needed cargo.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Karuncoin
string.body: Kahrun's Symbol;A token granted by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kahrun] himself. It is given only to those who have shown great dedication to the safety of the Reian people through battle with the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41253b
string.body: Modest Bloom;This flower is simple and pure-white, often laid on a grave as a symbol of abiding love.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41253a_flaower
string.body: Bunch of Simple Flowers;A bouquet of small, lovely flowers symbolic of abiding love.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41267a_bomb
string.body: Powerful Aether Bomb;A bomb made by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Joubis]. Although crude, a bomb is still a bomb. Try not to drop it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41270A_pagati
string.body: Pagati Soup;A rich, salty soup that is usually eaten with torn herbs. It might make [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Kinotia] feel better.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41257B_stone
string.body: Relics with Healing Power;These relics are blessed by Lady Yustiel, patron of Clerics and Chanters and guardian of life.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41300_pagati
string.body: Wild Pagati Reins;Reins used to break and tame wild Pagati.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41452B_WS
string.body: Truth Dagger;A dagger that used to sit at the waist of the Holy Statue. Its design is known only to Weaponsmithing Masters.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41452B_AS
string.body: Decorative Armour;Elegant armour to adorn the Holy Statue. The design is known to Armoursmithing Masters.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41452B_TA
string.body: Holy Insignia;An insignia that represents the Reian Tribe. Knowledgable Tailoring Masters know its design.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41452B_HA
string.body: Orb of Sacrifice;A beautiful sphere representing the rising sun, made in honour of Lady Siel's great sacrifice. Handicrafting Masters know its design.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41452B_AL
string.body: Empyrean Lady Siel's Essence;A decoction said to mimic the energies of the Empyrean Lady Siel. The best of the Alchemy Masters know how to make it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41452B_CO
string.body: Bladder Glue;A high-quality glue made by processing rare fish bladders. Cooking Masters can make this.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41452B_ME
string.body: Elaborate Rack;A rack inlaid with different-colored woods in gorgeous Reian motifs. Construction Masters know how to make it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41451a_1
string.body: Warm Fragrant Energy;An energy that gives off the scent of growth. It smells like springtime rain, or summer grass. You can get this from a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_househerb_Q41451_l] in Oriel, or a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_househerb_Q41451_d] in Pernon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41451b_1
string.body: Cool Fragrant Energy;An energy that gives off the scent of delicate decay. It smells like piles of autumn leaves, or a crisp snowfall. You can take it from a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_househerb_Q41451_l2] in Oriel, or a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_househerb_Q41451_d2] in Pernon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41452a_1
string.body: Shining Holy Statue of Siel;A complicated statue of Empyrean Lady Siel. You need all available crafting skills to make the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q41452_recip].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41453b_01
string.body: Noble Dew;Dew you can collect from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q41453_list] while wearing the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Q41453a_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41454a_01
string.body: Dedication Curio;A badge that declares the wearer's devotion to Sarpan. It is granted by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Oddone].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41454a_02
string.body: Sacrifice Curio;A badge that indicates the wearer's sacrifices for Sarpan. It is granted by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Pasquale].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41453a_01
string.body: Shabby Ring;A tarnished old ring passed down through the Siel's Spear Legion for ages.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q60devanion_01
string.body: Sign of Faith;An insignia that declares the wearer's faith in Lady Siel. You can buy one from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aughoetia].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q60devanion_02
string.body: Sign of Strong Faith;An insignia that declares the wearer's strong faith in Lady Siel. You can buy one from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aughoetia].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q60devanion_03
string.body: Sign of Earnest Faith;An insignia that declares the wearer's earnest faith in Lady Siel. You can buy one from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aughoetia].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_sad_01
string.body: Vernal Flower Aether Ore;Brilliantly-colored, faceted piece of Aether produced by Umbronite ore, which can be found in Pernon and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_happy_01
string.body: Pyre Spirit Aether Ore;Brilliantly-colored, faceted piece of Aether produced by Umbronite ore, which can be found in Pernon and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_delight_01
string.body: Maple Aether Ore;Brilliantly-colored, faceted piece of Aether produced by Umbronite ore, which can be found in Pernon and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_angry_01
string.body: Ice Aether Ore;Brilliantly-colored, faceted piece of Aether produced by Umbronite ore, which can be found in Pernon and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_scary_01
string.body: Broken Aether Gem;Brilliantly-colored, faceted piece of Aether produced by Umbronite ore, which can be found in Pernon and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_amazing_01
string.body: Rough Aether Gem;Brilliantly-colored, faceted piece of Aether produced by Umbronite ore, which can be found in Pernon and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_lonely_01
string.body: Hard Aether Gem;Brilliantly-colored, faceted piece of Aether produced by Umbronite ore, which can be found in Pernon and may be produced by seasonal Agrints.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12030a
string.body: Sounding Gem;The Balaur use this crystal as a map. It is owned by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_TDown_DrakanFi_Noble_60_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12034a
string.body: Protectorate Ring[pl:"Rings"];A ring taken from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_TDown_DrakanFi_Tiamat_60_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_TDown_DrakanSC_Tiamat_60_Ae], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_TDown_DrakanWi_Tiamat_60_Ae], or [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_TDown_DrakanCl_Tiamat_60_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12058a
string.body: Bronze Piece;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Gargoyle_58_An] has this piece.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12058b
string.body: Granite Piece;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_SouledStone_58_An] has this piece.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12058c
string.body: Noble Piece;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Sam_58_An] has this piece.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22058a
string.body: Lasi's Leash;A leash that [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Desron] used to walk her pet Maeki. Lasi has gone wild, becoming an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_Displacerbeast_Rage_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22059a
string.body: Strong Horn;A [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T3_FanaticPet_58_An]'s horn, particularly suited to comb-making.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q11550_stigma
string.body: Mysterious Stigma;A stigma that you receive after you have proven your abilities, either in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_Occupation_Combat], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_L] or on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_08]. Tell [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bariunos] which of the three challenges you want to accept beforehand.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q21550_stigma
string.body: Mysterious Stigma;A stigma that you receive after you have proven your abilities, either in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_Occupation_Combat], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDArena_pvp_D] or on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4a_SZ_B1_08]. Tell [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vaut] which of the three challenges you want to accept beforehand.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q28812_detail
string.body: Pink Nyanco Statue;1 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_sad_01], 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_scary_01]s, and 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_amazing_01]s are required to craft this statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q28813_detail
string.body: Shugo Lad Statue;1 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_happy_01], 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_amazing_01]s, and 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_lonely_01]s are required to craft this statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q28814_detail
string.body: Sorcerer Sprigg Statue;1 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_delight_01], 10 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_amazing_01]s, 15 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_lonely_01]s, and 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_scary_01]s are required to craft this statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q28815_detail
string.body: Whitebeard Manduri Statue;1 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_angry_01], 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_lonely_01]s, and 25 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_scary_01]s are required to craft this statue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q28816_detail
string.body: Leaves of Four Seasons;Leaves collected from seasonal Agrints: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_SPRING_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_SUMMER_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_FALL_01], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_LEAF_WINTER_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q28817_detail
string.body: Crystals of Four Seasons;Crystals collected from seasonal Agrints: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_SPRING_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_SUMMER_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_FALL_01], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_JUNK_CRYSTAL_WINTER_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_coin_medal_03
string.body: Balaur Serum;Special Items Distributors [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Schokios] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Indalon] sell this serum at the Siel's Spear Headquarters in Kamar. You must pay for it with Abyss Points.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_04
string.body: White Ribbon;A ribbon carried by many creatures during the Atreia Millennium Festival. You can trade them for exciting items with a Festival Staff Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_05
string.body: Smooth Petal;You can gather these petals from many creatures during the Atreia Millennium Festival. You can trade them for exciting items with a Festival Staff Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_06
string.body: Comet Powder;A powder you can collect from creatures during the Atreia Millennium Festival. You can trade them powder for exciting items with a Festival Staff Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_07
string.body: Dried Sweet Dado;Dried Dado carried by many creatures during the Atreia Millennium Festival. You can trade them for exciting items with a Festival Staff Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_08
string.body: Silver Lump;You can gather these metal lumps from many creatures during the Atreia Millennium Festival. You can trade them for XP with a Festival Staff Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_CCU_CHINA_01
string.body: Fortune Card;You can make this card from a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_CHINA_01A] and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_CHINA_02A]. These cards are valuable to Fortunetellers, who will trade for them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_CHINA_01A
string.body: Golden Essence;While the Fortune Trader is in Atreia, creatures will carry this marble of gold and garnet.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_CHINA_02A
string.body: Red Silk;This fine, blood-red silk is given to everyone when the Fortune Trader is in Atreia. It is automatically added to your inventory.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18834_LF2item
string.body: Eltnen Compost;Soil samples collected by hunting Manduri, Spirits, Vespine or Frillneck in the Macori Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18836_LF2item
string.body: Eltnen Compost;Soil samples collected by hunting Crestlich, Kurin, Basilisk or Gnarl in the Eiron Desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18838_LF2item
string.body: Eltnen Compost;Soil samples collected by hunting Gryphu, Basilisk, Gnarl, Scolopen or Sheluk in the Eracus Desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q28834_DF2item
string.body: Morheim Soil;Soil samples collected by hunting Darus, Ettins, Taygas, Worgs, and Crasaurs in the Morheim Snow Field.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q28836_DF2item
string.body: Morheim Soil;Soil samples collected by hunting Sylphens, Fungens, Fungies, and Spriggans in the Patamor Thicket.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q28838_DF2item
string.body: Salintus Soil;Soil samples collected by hunting Ksellids, Ice Claw Footsoldiers, Ice Claw Hunters, Snufflers, Abexes, Taygas, and Munmun Braves in Salintus Rise.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30404a
string.body: Macori's Lantern;A long lantern on a pole, cleverly fashioned by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_LeafyManduriFi_57_An] and used as a weapon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30454a
string.body: Noble Fruit;A hard fruit used as a projectile by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_B1_LeafyManduriWi_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18844all
string.body: Fertilizer Material;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_amazing_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_scary_01], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_fragment_lonely_01], which can be used to make Guestbloom Fertilizer.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28844all
string.body: Fertilizer Material;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_amazing_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_scary_01], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_od_d_fragment_lonely_01], which can be used to make Guestbloom Fertilizer.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_EASTER_01
string.body: Mottled Egg;To obtain this, gather [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_EASTER_01A], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_EASTER_02A], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_EASTER_03A], and colour the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_EASTER_04A]. Gather many of these eggs and take them to a Social Welfare Worker in Oriel or Pernon, who will exchange them for a Noble Box of Life.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_EASTER_01A
string.body: Red Dye;Dye you can obtain by hunting during the festival.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_EASTER_02A
string.body: Green Dye;Dye you can obtain by hunting during the festival.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_EASTER_03A
string.body: Yellow Dye;Dye you can obtain by hunting during the festival.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_EASTER_04A
string.body: Smooth Eggshell;An eggshell from a giant Pluma. You can obtain this by hunting during Easter.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30602a
string.body: Dredgion Supplies;Get these supplies from the Supplies Storage room of the Terath Dredgion or from Shulack Drudges.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_HCOIN201A_BOX_04
string.body: Fortune Envelope;An envelope you can make by combining a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_CHINA_01A] and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_CHINA_02A]. Open the envelope and you can obtain the precious [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_CCU_CHINA_01]. If you're lucky, you may also get useful consumables.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_CCU_WORLD_01
string.body: Golden Stew;You can obtain this by opening a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_HCOIN202A_BOX_04]. Gather many bowls and take them to Kiryak or Varya, who will exchange them for a valuable gift.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_WORLD_01A
string.body: Golden Fragment;Bright, glittering fragment you can obtain by hunting.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_WORLD_02A
string.body: Tasty Grain;Grain blown about by the wind that is automatically collected in your inventory. You can almost taste the delicious recipes that can be made with it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_HCOIN202A_BOX_04
string.body: Yellow Dough Pouch;A pouch you can make by combining a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_WORLD_01A] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_MATERIAL_WORLD_02A]. Open the pouch to find precious [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_AU_CCU_WORLD_01]. If you're lucky, you may also get useful consumables.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_50007a
string.body: Granker's Bridle;A bridle restraining Red Nose Grankers near Oriel Plaza. Defeat a Granker restrained by this item, and you may get it for yourself.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_51007a
string.body: Granker's Bridle;A bridle restraining Red Nose Grankers near Pernon Plaza. Defeat a Granker restrained by this item, and you may get it for yourself.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80175a
string.body: Tog Rib[pl:"Ribs"];You can acquire these if you slay the Togs in Altgard.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80175b
string.body: Mosbear Tusk[pl:"Tusks"];You can acquire this if you slay the Starved Mosbear in Altgard.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80179a
string.body: Tog Rib[pl:"Ribs"];You can acquire these if you slay the Togs in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80179b
string.body: Frillneck Egg[pl:"Eggs"];You will receive these if you slay the Rakeclaw Frillnecks of Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80190a
string.body: Slink Oil;Sticky oil that can be acquired near the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80190b
string.body: Lobnite Pincer[pl:"Pincers"];You will receive these if you slay the Lobnites near the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80194a
string.body: Slink Oil;Sticky oil that can be acquired near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80194b
string.body: Lobnite Pincer[pl:"Pincers"];You will receive these if you slay the Lobnites near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80196a
string.body: Basilisk Leather;You will receive this if you slay the Basilisks in Verteron.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80200a
string.body: Basilisk Leather;You will receive this if you slay the Basilisks in Altgard.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_50011a
string.body: Sweet Chocolate[pl:"Chocolates"];Chocolate that the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ValentineEvent_Brownie_Solo] stole out of envy. Defeat him and get it back.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_50012a
string.body: Very Bitter Chocolate;[%dic:STR_DIC_M_ValentineEvent_Shulack_Couple]s give this chocolate to their SOs. No one wants to eat it, though, since it fills the mouth with bitterness.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_50017a
string.body: Fine Handmade Candy;An item that Shulacks tried to smuggle through [%dic:STR_DIC_E_FOBJ_Event_Cargobox] to give their sweethearts.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_50018a
string.body: Loner Member Association Appreciation Shovel;A gift for the Loners, which was in the shipment of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_FOBJ_Event_Cargobox] scattered by Shulacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Pccafe_eventitem
string.body: Mysterious Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"];An event item. You will receive one scroll for every hour you are logged in. Maximum three scrolls per day.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Heart1
string.body: Right Half of a Broken Heart;This combines with the left half to make an exchangeable item. If you can't find the match, put your half in the Love Letterbox.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Heart2
string.body: Left Half of a Broken Heart;This combines with the right half to make an exchangeable item. If you can't find the match, put your half in the Love Letterbox.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_wingwar_coin
string.body: Lord's Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];You will receive one of these for every hour you are logged in. Bring it to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_tinofos] and receive a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_wingwar_coin_d
string.body: Lord's Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];You will receive one of these every hour you are logged in. Bring it to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_gildrof] and receive a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41463_poty
string.body: Siel's Petal Bloom;You can obtain Siel's Petals from this bloom. Meticulous care is required as it is a very valuable bloom.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41463a
string.body: Siel's Petal[pl:"Petals"];A sacred petal that contains the essence of Lady Siel. You can obtain it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Q41463_poty].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41464a
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Rancour;An essence of concentrated rancour. You can obtain it from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C1_Yun_undead_Fi_57_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C1_Yun_undead_Wi_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41464b
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Wrath;An essence containing concentrated wrath. You can obtain it from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C2_DrakanFi_noble_58_An][plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C2_DrakanAs_noble_58_An][plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C2_DrakanRa_noble_57_An][plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C2_DrakanWi_noble_57_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_C2_DrakanPr_noble_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41464c
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Sadness;An essence containing concentrated sadness. You can obtain it from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_D_Yun_undead_Wi_58_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4A_D_Yun_undead_Fi_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41465a
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Madness;An essence containing concentrated madness. You can obtain it from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_DrakanSc_Sikara_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_DrakanFi_Noble_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_DrakanSc_Noble_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_DrakanWi_Noble_58_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T1_DrakanCl_Noble_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41465b
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Life;An essence containing concentrated life. You can obtain it from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_YunFi_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_YunAs_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_YunSc_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_YunWi_58_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_YunPr_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41465c
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Voidness;An essence containing the concentrated power of voidness. You can obtain it from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_YunFi_Ghost_59_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T4_YunWi_Ghost_59_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41466_shopmaterial
string.body: Mysterious Powder[pl:"Powders"];Material used for making bright lightbeams. It will glow brightly if it comes into contact with DP. It is available from[%dic:STR_DIC_N_Safadorn].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41466a
string.body: Pure Light[pl:"Lights"];There is a slight possibility that you will acquire this when you create bright lightbeams. An important material for Luminaciel Weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41466b
string.body: Bright Light Beam[pl:"Beams"];There is a slight possibility of acquiring pure light when producing bright light beams. The pattern can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Safadorn].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41467_shopmaterial
string.body: Activation booster;A booster required for collecting [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Q41467_od]. It is available from[%dic:STR_DIC_N_Safadorn].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41467a
string.body: Sacred Odium;Material for Luminaciel Weapons. You can obtain it by gathering[%dic:STR_DIC_N_Q41467_od].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41467b
string.body: Burning Sacred Odium;There is a slight possibility that you will acquire this when gathering [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Q41467_od].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q41468a
string.body: Sign of Faith;A sign indicating profound faith in Siel. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aughoetia].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_event_worlddrop_1
string.body: Vitality of the Soul;Earn this by killing monsters all over Atreia during the Event. It is known to be an Alchemists' ingredient.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_event_worlddrop_2
string.body: Essence of Life;You will receive this by killing monsters all over throughout Atreia during the Event. It is known to be an Alchemists' ingredient.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_DEVASDAY_01
string.body: Aether Glow;Bright radiant Aether Glow;Elyos receive it at[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1], in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_OP], in Sarpan, in Tiamaranta or in the Abyss. Asmodians receive it in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_A], in the Gelkmaros Stronhold, in Sarpan, in Tiamaranta or in the Abyss. Bring Aether Glow to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_EVENT_Happolia] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_EVENT_Berdinea], and you will receive a candle in exchange that you can use on the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_World_Cake_of_Devas_Day_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_DEVASDAY_02
string.body: Lord's Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];Earn this crystal by staying in Atreia during the Event, killing monsters or doing favours for Israphel's delegation. Collect multiple crystals and bring them to Lord [%dic:STR_DIC_N_EVENT_Lupoise]'s and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_EVENT_Clantia]'s traders on [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] and at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3] and receive various gifts.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_SCROLL_Devas_Day_L
string.body: Burning Candle[pl:"Candles"];If you use it on the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_World_Cake_of_Devas_Day_L], the EP of all Daevas in your vicinity increases threefold.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_SCROLL_Devas_Day_L_02
string.body: Magic Candle[pl:"Candles"];If you use it on the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_World_Cake_of_Devas_Day_L], the EP of all Daevas in your vicinity increases threefold.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_SCROLL_Devas_Day_L_03
string.body: Holy Candle Energy[pl:"Energies"];If you use this on the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_World_Cake_of_Devas_Day_L], you and all Daevas in the vicinity immediately recover 2000 GK points. Your attack speed increases by 10%% and your activation time for magic skills decreases by 10%% while in this status.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4116a
string.body: Silikor of Memory;A memory kept by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_LF2a_Q4116]. It may contain ancient research data.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4118a
string.body: Essence of the Ancient Spirits;Earn this by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_D_IDLF2a_Q4118a], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_D_IDLF2a_Q4118b], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_D_IDLF2a_Q4118c] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_D_IDLF2a_Q4118d] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_D_LF2a_entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q3117a
string.body: Karemiwen's Hairbrush;The hairbrush that [%dic:STR_DIC_E_L_DF2a_Q3117] carries in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_L_DF2a_entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q3118a
string.body: Undead Blood Drops;Earn these by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_L_IDDF2a_Q3119a], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_L_IDDF2a_Q3119b], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_L_IDDF2a_Q3119c], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_L_IDDF2a_Q3119d] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_L_IDDF2a_Q3119e] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_L_DF2a_entrance].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_vip_01a
string.body: Symbol of Glory;Reward for being victorious in the Arena of Glory in the Crucible Coliseum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ITEM_FIRST_BEER
string.body: First-Rate Beer;A beer classified as first-rate by [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_Octorung] because of its good taste and aroma. It has a strange effect. You feel rested and recover 50%% of Energy of Repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ITEM_SECOND_BEER
string.body: Second-Rate Beer;A beer classified as second-rate by [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_Octorung] because of its good taste and aroma. It has a strange effect. You feel rested and recover 20%% of Energy of Repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ITEM_THIRD_BEER
string.body: Third-Rate Beer;A beer classified as third-rate by [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_Octorung] because of its good taste and aroma. It has a strange effect. You feel rested and recover 10%% of Energy of Repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_ITEM_FOURTH_BEER
string.body: Partly Fermented Beer;A sample that [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_Octorung] gives to Daevas who bring him wet barley. It tastes bitter, but it has a strange effect. You feel a little more rested and recover 5%% of Energy of Repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_REKLOV
string.body: Reklov Ticket[pl:"Tickets"];With this ticket, you can buy beer or the <Drunken Master> title from [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_Reklov].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_NITRAM
string.body: Nitram Ticket[pl:"Tickets"];With this ticket, you can buy beer or the <Drunken Master> title from [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_Nitram].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_EIMAJ
string.body: Eimaj Ticket[pl:"Tickets"];With this ticket, you can buy beer or the <Drunken Master> title from [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_Eimaj].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80284A
string.body: Wet Barley;If you bring this to [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_Octorung] in Sanctum or Pandaemonium, you will receive valuable rewards, such as a rare beer that can recover Energy of Repose. The barley will already be spoiled and useless when the Beer Festival begins.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_INGREDIENT
string.body: Well-Dried Barley;Barley that [%dic:STR_DIC_NPC_Octorung] has dried well. Bring it to the master brewer and exchange it for a ticket that you can use to buy valuable rewards, such as a rare beer that can recover Energy of Repose.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10070a
string.body: Kaisinel's Will;Kaisinel's firm intention that all Elyos take part in the fight against Tiamat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10071a
string.body: Traces of the Unstable Portal;Portal traces found on the Bloody Throne. This is the place where Israphel vanished.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10071b
string.body: Traces of the Unstable Portal;The vibrations emanating from them are similar to those in the Anaz Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10072a
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Time and Space;This essence can be obtained from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4a_Monster_M_Aurora_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10073a
string.body: Confidentiality Agreement[pl:"Agreements"];An agreement regarding the truths about the Great Catastrophe and Israphel's Plot.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10073b
string.body: Signed Confidentiality Agreement[pl:"Agreements"];A confidentiality agreement regarding the truths about the Great Catastrophe and Israphel's Plot.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10073c
string.body: Sealed Letter[pl:"Letters"];A letter from Sanctum to Kahrun containing the order to maintain confidentiality.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20070a
string.body: Marchutan's Will;Marchutan's firm intention that all Asmodians should take part in the fight against Tiamat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20071a
string.body: Traces of the Unstable Portal;Portal traces found on the Bloody Throne. This is the place where Israphel vanished.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20071b
string.body: Traces of the Unstable Portal;Their vibrations are similar to those in the Anaz Forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20072a
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Space and Time;You can obtain this essence from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4a_Monster_M_Aurora_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20073a
string.body: Confidentiality Agreement[pl:"Agreements"];An agreement regarding the truths about the Great Catastrophe and Israphel's Plot.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20073b
string.body: Signed Confidentiality Agreement[s];A confidentiality agreement regarding the truths about the Great Catastrophe and Israphel's Plot.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20073c
string.body: Sealed Letter[pl:"Letters"];A letter from Pandaemonium to Kahrun containing the order to maintain confidentiality.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30706a
string.body: Loose, soiled pages of the Prophecy;Loose pages of the prophecy that was stolen from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bhasha]. You will probably find them among the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q30706a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30707a
string.body: Behasha's Prophecy[pl:"Prophecies"];[%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bhasha]'s prophecy about Tiamat's death.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30710a
string.body: Yustiel's Blessing;A sacred item that has releasing powers. If you carry this item with you and touch the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Li_Statue], you can release the petrified hero.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30712a
string.body: Energy Shield Absorber;Located in the interior of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTiamat_S2_StealthUnit_60_Ae]. It decreases the power of the energy shield.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30713a
string.body: Converted Energy Shield Absorber;A temporarily altered [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_30712a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30713b
string.body: Extracted Rancour of Apsu;[%dic:STR_DIC_E_Apsu]'s Rancour in a [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Dagger]. You can instinctively feel that this item is extremely dangerous.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30760a
string.body: Marchutan's Blessing;A sacred item that has releasing powers. If you carry this item with you and touch the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDTiamat_FOBJ_Da_Statue], you can release the petrified hero.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30720a
string.body: Sabat's Song;A musical box that used to belong to Dragon Lord Tiamat. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Adela] might be interested in it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_IDLDF5b_TD_Map_Q18034
string.body: Defence Plan of the Steel Wall Bastion;A page torn from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF5b_TD_Map_Q18034]. It shows how the Steel Wall Bastion will be defended against the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_COIN_CASH_ID_1_COIN
string.body: Shugo Coin[pl:"Coins"];A coin used by the Shugos. You will receive it as a reward if you kill the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEVENT01] or do a favour for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDEvent01_In_NPC] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ASSEMBLY_WORLD_EVENT_INST_ITEM_MAP
string.body: Imperial Tomb Treasure Map;A map marking the locations where the Empire's treasures were hidden. There are four pieces in total. The map will only reveal its secrets when you have joined all four pieces. You will obtain the pieces by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDEVENT01] or opening the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_INST_01_COIN_01] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_INST_01_COIN_01
string.body: Chest containing a Treasure Map Piece;A chest containing a piece of the Treasure Map of the Empire. You need a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_INST_01_KEY_01] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_CASH_01_KEY_01] to open it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_INST_01_KEY_01
string.body: Ordinary Treasure Chest Key;A key wehich emanates a silver glow. It is needed to open the Treasure Chest in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01_Room]. As it emanates no magical power, it will disappear from your inventory as soon as you leave the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_CASH_01_KEY_01
string.body: Indestructible Treasure Chest Key;A key imbued with a powerful spell. You need it to open the Treasure Chest in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01_Room]. It will not disappear from your inventory when you leave the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2flying_event01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16904a
string.body: Insignia[pl:"Insignia"] of the Lepharist Revolutionaries;An insignia with the symbol of the Revolutionaries engraved. Take this item to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF3_Demonax_G] to receive a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16909a
string.body: Insignia[pl:"Insignia"] of the Hoarfrost Tribe;An insignia decorated with the emblem of the Mau. Take this item to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF3_Alcmenes_G] to receive a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26904a
string.body: Insignia[pl:"Insignia"] of the Lepharist Revolutionaries;An insignia with the symbol of the Revolutionaries engraved. Take this item to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF3_Leif_G] to receive a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26909a
string.body: Insignia[pl:"Insignia"] of the Hoarfrost Tribe;An insignia decorated with the weapons of the Mau. Take this item to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF3_Helgi_G] to receive a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10091a
string.body: Beritra Army Command;According to this order, the survivors of Tiamat's legion should be killed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10092a
string.body: Component[pl:"Components"] of the Ancient Weapon;This item can be found with [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_E_Shulack] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10092b
string.body: Structural Part[pl:"Parts"] of the Ancient Weapon;This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_E_Vri_Fanatic] at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10093a
string.body: Giant Idgel Cube[pl:"Cubes"];This is a very large Idgel Cube.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20091a
string.body: Beritra Army Command;This order states that the survivors of Tiamat's legion should be killed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20092a
string.body: Accuracy Component[pl:"Components"] of the Ancient Weapon;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_E_Shulack] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E2] owns this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20092b
string.body: Structural Component[pl:"Components"] of the Ancient Weapon;The [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_E_Vri_Fanatic] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_E1_1] owns these objects.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10082a
string.body: Ellokun's Belt;Belt worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF5A_A4_Fana_Wi_QN_61_An]. It indicates the rank of the wearer within the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10084a
string.body: Small amount of water;A quantity of water so small that you can only just take one sip. Can be extracted from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B8_Cactus_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10084c
string.body: Jewellery of the Reians;Jewellery only worn by high-ranking Reians.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10084d
string.body: Broken Reian Sword;A sword of the Reians which has been damaged.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10085b
string.body: Records of Kahrun;These records were left behind by Kahrun. This report contains information about the events in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20082a
string.body: Ellotum's Belt;Belt worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF5A_A2_Fana_Wi_QN_61_An]. This belt indicates the rank of the wearer within the Dragonbound.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20084a
string.body: Small amount of water;A quantity of water so small that you can only just take one sip. Eliminate [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B2_Cactus_63_An] to get it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20084c
string.body: Reian Armband[pl:"Armbands"];An armband only worn by high-ranking members of the Reian tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20084d
string.body: Broken Reian Sword;A piece has broken off of this Reian sword.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20085b
string.body: Records of Kahrun;Report left behind by Kahrun. This report contains information about the events in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_A
string.body: Gold Medal[pl:"Medals"] of the Emperor;A medal that belonged to the Shugo Emperor. It is made of gold and is very heavy. Place it on the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_WORLD_IDEVENT_TREASUREROOM] to enter the imperial Treasure Chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_B
string.body: Silver Medal[pl:"Medals"] of the Empress;A medal that belonged to the Shugo Empress. It is made of silver and gleams brightly. Place it on the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_WORLD_IDEVENT_TREASUREROOM] to enter the Treasure Chamber of the Empress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_C
string.body: Crown Prince's Brass Medal[pl:"Medals"];A medal that belonged to the Shugo Crown Prince. It is made of brass. Place it on the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_WORLD_IDEVENT_TREASUREROOM] to enter the Crown Prince's Treasure Chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_10083a
string.body: Torn Scroll Piece from the Journal of Kahrun;This report was left behind by Kahrun. It contains information about the events in Katalam. This is the 1st volume.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_10085a
string.body: Kahrun's Journal;This report was written by Kahrun. It tells about the events in Katalam. This is the 2nd volume.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_20083a
string.body: Kahrun's Torn Records;Kahrun left these records behind. This report tells about the events in Katalam. This is the 2nd volume.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_20085a
string.body: Records of Kahrun;These records were left behind by Kahrun. They contain information about the events in Katalam. This is the 1st volume.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_10084b
string.body: Kahrun's Message[pl:"Messages"];A message from Kahrun that was left for Jemini upon his departure. In the message, Kahrun writes that he is being followed by Beritra and is thus heading north. He asks Jemini to go to the Lake of Solitude and to tell everyone that he is being followed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_20084b
string.body: Kahrun's Message[pl:"Messages"];A message from Kahrun that was left for Jeminu upon his departure. In the message, Kahrun writes that he is being followed by Beritra and is thus heading south. He asks Jeminu to go to the Lake of Solitude and to tell everyone that he is being followed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_TOTAL
string.body: Shugo Emperor Family Medals;Medals identifying the members of the Shugo Emperor's Family. These include the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_A], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_B] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_MAP_C].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80312a
string.body: Concerned Letter;In this letter, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Cielo] voices concern for the Eltnen Guardian [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Fabiola].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80318a
string.body: Concerned Letter;In this letter, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Arabella] voices concern for the Morheim Protector[%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Ziva].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80314a
string.body: Elyos Mark[pl:"Marks"];An insignia that the soldiers of the Eltnen Protectors wore.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80320a
string.body: Asmodian Mark[pl:"Marks"];An insignia that the soldiers of the Morheim Protectors wore.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80316a
string.body: Topaz Ring[pl:"Rings"] of the Guardian Troop Leader;An Abyss accessory. Having it allows an attacker to deal additional damage to the opponent.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80317a
string.body: Aquamarine Ring[pl:"Rings"] of the Guardian Troop Leader;An Abyss accessory. Having it allows a Sorcerer to deal additional damage to the opponent.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80322a
string.body: Topaz Ring[pl:"Rings"] of the Archon Squad Leader;An Abyss accessory. Having it allows an attacker to deal additional damage to the opponent.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80323a
string.body: Aquamarine Ring[pl:"Rings"] of the Archon Squad Leader;An Abyss accessory. Having it allows a Sorcerer to deal additional damage to the opponent.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80314b
string.body: Abyss Voucher[pl:"Vouchers"];Voucher which allows the call of the Elyos who records Abyss achievements to reach you.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80320b
string.body: Abyss Voucher[pl:"Vouchers"];Voucher which allows the call of the Asmodian who records Abyss achievements to reach you.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80315a
string.body: Ring[pl:"Rings"] of the Guardian Troop Leader;An Abyss accessory that deals additional damage to the opponents.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80321a
string.body: Ring[pl:"Rings"] of the Archon Squad Leader;An Abyss accessory that deals additional damage to the opponents.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16950a
string.body: Sealed Secret Order;The secret order is sealed with the Traitor's Seal. The leadership of Goldrinyerk Limited is to be murdered. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRose_Shulack_Low_As_63_An_Nmd] of the Steel Rose owns these documents.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26950a
string.body: Sealed Kill Order;The kill order is sealed with the Traitor's Seal. The leadership of Goldrinyerk Limited is to be murdered. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRose_Shulack_Low_As_63_An_Nmd] of the Steel Rose owns these documents.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16950b
string.body: Plan of Goldrinyerk Limited's Interior;This plan shows the innner structure of Goldrinyerk Limited. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRose_Shadowstalker_Low_63_An_Nmd] of the Steel Rose owns these plans.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26950b
string.body: Secret Map of Goldrinyerk Limited;This plan shows the innner structure of Goldrinyerk Limited. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRose_Shadowstalker_Low_63_An_Nmd] of the Steel Rose owns this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16952a
string.body: Magic[pl:"Magic"] Crystal[pl:"Crystals"] of Song;A crystal owned by members of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRose_Shulack_M_As_63_An] of the Steel Rose.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26952a
string.body: Singing[pl:"Singing"] Magic Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A crystal owned by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRose_Shulack_M_As_63_An] of the Steel Rose.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16954a
string.body: Instrument[pl:"Instruments"] of the Steel Rose;A musical instrument used to play a song that mesmerises men. Captain [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRose_Shulack_Top_Ba_64_Ae2_Nmd] owns this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26954a
string.body: Instrument[pl:"Instruments"] of the Steel Rose;A musical instrument used to play a song that mesmerises men. Captain [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRose_Shulack_Top_Ba_64_Ae2_Nmd] owns this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20093a
string.body: Large Idgel Cube[pl:"Cubes"];This is a large Idgel Cube.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13003A
string.body: Meat of a Snowy Abex;A piece of meat from a Snowy Abex. This type of meat can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A2_Fethlot_65_n] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A2_Fethlot_64_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13006A
string.body: Ramparts Research Materials;The features of the Ramparts of the Rune Tribe can be investigated by using these materials. You can obtain these items by researching [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_FOBJ_A3_Wall].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13007A
string.body: Fur[pl:"Furs"] of a Ramparts Bosbear;A piece of fur from a Ramparts Bosbear. This item can be taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A3_MosbearMom_63_An] and from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A3_MosbearMom_64_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13011A
string.body: Investigation Report about the Nevilim Plateau;This report was written by the investigator of the 40th Beritra Army. The item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_A4_Vri].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13013A
string.body: Nevilim Fragment;A part of a frozen Nevilim. This item can be obtained by examining [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Nepilim].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13016A
string.body: Secret Note of the Spiritual Leader;This small letter was written in Shugo writing. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_C1_Vri_Fanatic_Wi_SN_NmdQ_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13022A
string.body: Idgel Cube[pl:"Cubes"];A cube which can be used to store Idgel. This item can be obtained by examining [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_FOBJ_C2_Idgel].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13026A
string.body: Insignia of the Attack Squad;This insignia is worn by Tiamat deserters. You can capture it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_C3_TR].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13031A
string.body: Unstable Idgel;Unstable Idgel can explode at any time. It contains exceptionally powerful energy. This item can be obtained by researching [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_FOBJ_D1_UnstableIdgel].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13036A
string.body: Jormungand's Necklace;A sign of faith, worn by the members of the Dragonbound. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_D2_Vri_Fanatic] owns this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13037A
string.body: Large Kinah Pouch;A pouch used mainly by Shugos to hold money. Obtain this item from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_D2_Vri2_Fanatic_Fi_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13041A
