string.body: Old Pouch[pl:"Pouches"];A bag used mainly by Daevas to hold money.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13044A
string.body: Stolen Goods;The Drekanu have stolen these goods from the Shugos. The Drekanus' Stolen Goods can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5B_E_Babar].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13049A
string.body: Glowing Blue Necklace[pl:"Necklaces"];A necklace decorated with jewels.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13051A
string.body: Sealed[pl:"Sealed"] Letter[pl:"Letters"];A letter sealed with a stamp.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13052A
string.body: Insignia[pl:"Insignia"] of the Supplies Troop;An insignia that indicates members of the Beritra Army's Supplies Troop. You can take this item from members of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_F123_Vri].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13053A
string.body: Plan[pl:"Plans"] for supplying Siege Weapons;A document describing the supply of Siege Weapons for the soldiers. The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f1_Vri2_Poison_As_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae] carries the plan on his person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13053B
string.body: Plan[pl:"Plans"] for supplying Transport Materials;A document describing the supply of Transport Materials for the soldiers. The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f2_Vri2_Weabind_Ri_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae]carries the plan on his person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13053C
string.body: Plan[pl:"Plans"] for supplying War Materials;A document describing the supply of War Materials for the soldiers. The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f3_Vri2_Confuse_El_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae] carries the plan on his person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13054A
string.body: Tetis' Report[pl:"Reports"];The records were made by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Tetis_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_13054B
string.body: Mission Report[pl:"Reports"];Report bearing information about the whole battle situation. This report was written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Heres_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13056A
string.body: Fragment[pl:"Fragments"] of the Aether Orb;The fragment of the Aether Orb exudes a magical power. The members of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_F4_Vri] carry this item on their person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13057A
string.body: Goldrinyerk War Materials;A trunk bearing the Goldrinyerk seal. It was made by Goldrinyerk Limited. This item can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_F4_TR].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13060A
string.body: Secret[pl:"Secret"] Book[pl:"Books"];The book contains records written in Shugo writing. This item can be taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_G_Alligator_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13063A
string.body: Kaberinerk's Report[pl:"Report"];This report was written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Kaberinrin_E]. Report about the status of the repair work at the Ramparts.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_13064A
string.body: Letter of Recognition from Pandarunerk;A token of recognition for those who have achieved great success for Goldrinyerk Limited.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13300A
string.body: A small quantity of Idgel;Idgel pieces, created by mixing a piece of skin from a contaminated Drakan with something that stinks of decay. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_B2_VriZomb].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13307A
string.body: Strategy[pl:"Strategies"] for the South Gate Battle;Battle strategy of the 40th Legion. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A4_Vri_Poison_As_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13311A
string.body: Rasputinerk's Necklace;Jewellery worn by the spiritual leader of the Dragonbound, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5b_C1_Vri_FanaRBoss_El_65_Nmd_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13312A
string.body: Life History of the Spiritual Leader;A thick book describing the life of the spiritual leader of Jormungand. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_C1_Vri_Fanatic].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13317A
string.body: Dragonbound Message;A note with only the time and place of an appointed meeting written on it. This message can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_D2_Vri_Fanatic_Fi_SN_NmdQ_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13327A
string.body: Orders of the 3rd Troop;The operation plan of the 3rd Troop is written in Balaur writing. This item can be obtained at [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_d1_Vri_Poison_As_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13336A
string.body: Beritra Soldier Weapon[pl:"Weapons"];A high-quality weapon taken from a Beritra Soldier. This weapon can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_F123_Vri].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13337A
string.body: List[pl:"Lists"] of the Balaur War Materials;The list contains the war materials stolen from the Beritra Army. This item can be taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f3_Vri2_Confuse_El_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13341A
string.body: Strategy[pl:"Strategies"] of the First Troop;This mission plan is written in Balaur writing. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f4_Vri_Poison_As_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13345A
string.body: Strategy Plan[pl:"Plans"] of the First Troop;This mission plan is written in Balaur writing. It can be obtained at [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f4_Vri_Confuse_El_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23551A
string.body: Lumber;Material that Shugos use for building. You can find it in a [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_E2_ShulackBox].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23554A
string.body: Used Ticket;A ticket for the Goldrinyerk Railroad, which Muti lost. You can obtain this item from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5b_E2_Shulack_SuTank_Fi_Nmd_64_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23556A
string.body: Rail Construction Materials;These materials are used for laying rails. They can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_OP_Railroad] area.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23558A
string.body: Cask of contaminated water;An oak cask filled with contaminated water. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_E_Shulack] owns this cask.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23559A
string.body: Rubbish Pile;A pile containing various types of rubbish, located in the Contaminated Swamp. This item can be collected at the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_G1_TrashHeap].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23560A
string.body: Active Charcoal;An item used to decontaminate water. [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_G_EttinN_65_An] own this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23563A
string.body: Red Shulack Bandana;Head covering worn by the seafarers of the Steel Rose. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_E_Shulack] has this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23565A
string.body: Spontaneously created Medicine;This healing mixture was hastily made out of wild Wasteland Airons. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_E_Hiiv_64_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12529a
string.body: Full[pl:"Full"] Kokonat Basket[pl:"Baskets"];[%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_G1_CoconasBasket] of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_G1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12532a
string.body: Taiga Meat;Meat which can be obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G1_Direbeast_Lio_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12533a
string.body: Saphirunerk's Kokonat[pl:"Kokonats"];A kokonat cultivated by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Sapparing_E]. It looks better than an ordinary kokonat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_12534a
string.body: Saphirunerk's Records;Records made by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Sapparing_E] in person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12558a
string.body: Indecipherable Rubbing[pl:"Rubbings"];A rubbing that can be obtained at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_RunePiece_1]. The rubbing is unclear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12558b
string.body: Slightly Better Rubbing[pl:"Rubbings"];A rubbing that can be obtained at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_RunePiece_2]. The rubbing is a little clearer than the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_22558a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12559a
string.body: Eremion's Possessions;Items that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5a_E6_GhostRune_As_Nmd_63_Ae]. The items appear to have personal value.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_12565a
string.body: Eremion's Journal;A journal of the Rune Tribe, located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E3]. It describes the history of the Rune Tribe's demise.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12552a
string.body: Contaminated, Mutated Tissue;Tissue Sample that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_F_TDrakan_Zom_Fi_64_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_F_TDrakan_Zom_Wi_64_An]. The mutation has caused it to turn blue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12553a
string.body: Sticky[pl:"Sticky"] Idgel Piece[pl:"Pieces"];The Idgel Piece can be obtained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_F_DrTooth_64_An]. It is all gummed up into a clump.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12554b
string.body: Plant Sample from Katalam;A plant sample that can be extracted from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_F_Soil].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_12548a
string.body: Perinerk's Records;Records made by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Perinrin_E] in person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12535a
string.body: Fragrant White Flower;This flower was obtained for the purpose of placing it on [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_G2_DeadGuardian].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12537a
string.body: Old Accessory of the Rune Tribe;Relic of the Rune Tribe, owned by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G2_Nebilim_63_An]. It appears to have some sort of connection to the Temple of Tears.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12538a
string.body: Straight Rotron Twig;This twig specimen can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G2_RottenTree_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12538b
string.body: Dry Agrint Root[pl:"Roots"];The sample of an Agrint Root can be obtained from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G2_Agrint_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12540a
string.body: Portable Repair Tool[pl:"Tools"];A repair tool carried by the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G3_Brownie_Woker_63_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12542a
string.body: Warm Food Ration[pl:"Rations"];A meal offered by the Green Hat Alliance. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Minoa_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12543a
string.body: Delicious Food Ration[pl:"Rations"];A meal offered by the Green Hat Alliance. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Minoa_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12545a
string.body: Damaged Metal Parts;Metal parts that can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_G3_IronParts].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12547a
string.body: Wood with a fine grain;Wood required for the kokonat still. It was carefully selected by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Perinrin_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12562a
string.body: Blue[pl:"Blue"] Stone Shard[pl:"Shards"];These pieces have a strange appearance. They can be used near the Ramparts at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12564a
string.body: Engraved Runestone;A stone with an engraving. It can be obtained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A2_Nebilim_61_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A4_Nebilim_61_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A3_Nebilim_62_An]. This stone exudes a mysterious, magical force.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12802a
string.body: Stone of the Nevilim Guardian;Stone from the body of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A2_Nebilim_61_An]. It appears to be very hard.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12805a
string.body: Sharp Fang;A fang from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A4_Zaif_61_An]. It really seems to be very sharp.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12807a
string.body: Cleanup Squad Supplies;Supplies located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_A4_SupplyBox].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12810a
string.body: Flexible Twig;This twig from a tree is flexible but sturdy. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A1_Agrint_62_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12815a
string.body: Iron Shell[pl:"Shells"];This shell can be taken from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A5_Startutle_62_n]. It looks very sturdy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12816a
string.body: Tangled Fine Root;Only small quantities of this fine root can be extracted from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A5_Rafflesia_Dr_62_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12820a
string.body: Niel's Letter;A letter that [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lettering_E] is keeping safe.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12821a
string.body: Music Box[pl:"Boxes"] of Memory;Kill a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B6_Baku_NamedQ_62_An] to receive this music box. It seems that someone has handled it very carefully.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12822a
string.body: Clear[pl:"Clear"] Mookie's Sap[pl:"Saps"];You can obtain this sap by defeating a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B6_Cactus_62_An]. It looks drinkable as it's clean.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12828a
string.body: Combat order[pl:"orders"] of the Underground Squad;A document containing combat orders.[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_D_UndeadDark_Fi_64_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_D_UndeadDark_Wi_64_An] carry the document on their person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12833a
string.body: Tree trunk contaminated by Id;Sample that can be extracted from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B9_RottenTree_Id_64_An]. The contamination has given it a blue colouring.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12941a
string.body: Id Research Records of the Rune Tribe;An ancient document owned by[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_E5_Vritra_Gu_DD_65_An]. It appears to contain information that has some sort of connection with Id.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22529a
string.body: Full[pl:"Full"] Kokonat Basket[pl:"Baskets"];A[%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_C1_CoconasBasket], which can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22532a
string.body: Taiga Meat;You can obtain this meat by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_C1_Direbeast_Lio_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22533a
string.body: Rubininerk's Kokonat[pl:"Kokonats"];A kokonat cultivated by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rubyring_E]. It looks better than an ordinary kokonat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_22534a
string.body: Rubininerk's Notebook;The entries in this notebook were made by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rubyring_E] himself.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22558a
string.body: Indecipherable Rubbing[pl:"Rubbings"];A rubbing that can be obtained at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_RunePiece_1]. It is difficult to decipher.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22558b
string.body: Slightly Better Rubbing[pl:"Rubbings"];A rubbing that can be obtained at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_RunePiece_2]. The rubbing is a little clearer than the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_22558a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22559a
string.body: Eremion's Insignia;This can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5a_E6_GhostRune_As_Nmd_63_Ae]. It seems to have a special significance.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_22565a
string.body: Eremion's Memory;Journal of the Rune Tribe, located in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E3]. It tells of the Rune Tribe's demise.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_22548a
string.body: Rogrinerk's Notebook;The entries in this notebook were made by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rogring_E] in person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22535a
string.body: Fresh White Flower;This flower was obtained for the purpose of placing it on [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_C2_DeadArchon].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22538a
string.body: Mutated Rotron Root[pl:"Roots"];A root that can be taken from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_C2_RottenTree_63_An]. It is mutated.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22540a
string.body: Multifunctional Repair Tool[pl:"Tools"];A repair tool carried by the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_C3_Brownie_Woker_63_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22542a
string.body: Warm Food Ration[pl:"Rations"];A meal offered by the Green Hat Alliance. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Mabran_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22543a
string.body: Delicious Food Ration[pl:"Rations"];A meal offered by the Green Hat Alliance. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Mabran_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22545a
string.body: Lost Metal Piece[pl:"Pieces"];These are metal pieces that can be found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_C3_IronParts].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22547a
string.body: Wood with a distinctive grain;Wood required for the kokonat still. It was carefully selected by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Rogring_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22552a
string.body: Combat order[pl:"orders"] of the Attack Squad;A document containing the combat order, which [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_D_UndeadLight_Fi_64_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_D_UndeadLight_Wi_64_An] carry on their person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22562a
string.body: Blue[pl:"Blue"] Stone Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];These pieces have a strange appearance. They can be used near the Ramparts at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_E5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22564a
string.body: Magical[pl:"Magical"] Rune Stone[pl:"Stones"];An engraved stone that can be obtained from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A2_Nebilim_61_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A4_Nebilim_61_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A3_Nebilim_62_An]. This stone exudes a magical force.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22566a
string.body: Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"] to remove the Ward;A scroll used to remove the Magical Ward. This item can be used in the Magical Ward in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5a_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22801a
string.body: Front Paw;Front paw of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A2_Daru]. It is not very big.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22803a
string.body: Patrol Supplies[pl:"Supplies"];The items located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_A2_SupplyBox].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22807a
string.body: Stone of the Nevilim Outrider;This stone can be obtained from the body of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A4_Nebilim_61_An]. It appears to be very hard.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22810a
string.body: Stunning Spore;These spores can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A1_Fungy_61_n]. They have a stunning effect.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22811a
string.body: Tangled Fine Root;This type of fine root can only be extracted from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A1_Rafflesia_Dr_62_An] in small quantities.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22816a
string.body: Iron Carapace;This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A5_Startutle_62_n]. It looks exceptionally robust.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22820a
string.body: Jakahn's Letter;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Lettering_E] is in possession of this letter.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22821a
string.body: Music Box[pl:"Boxes"] of Hindsight;Kill a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B6_Baku_NamedQ_62_An] to receive this music box. It seems that someone has handled it very carefully.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22822a
string.body: Clean Mookie's Sap[pl:"Saps"];You can obtain this sap by defeating a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B6_Cactus_62_An]. It looks drinkable as it's clean.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22833a
string.body: Contaminated Skin Tissue;Tissue Sample that can be taken from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_F_TDrakan_Zom_Fi_64_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_F_TDrakan_Zom_Wi_64_An]. The mutation has caused it to turn blue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22840a
string.body: Id Book of the Rune Tribe;An ancient book owned by[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_E5_Vritra_Gu_DD_65_An]. It appears to contain information that has some sort of connection with Id.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13558a
string.body: Ramparts Ore;The ore can be found in [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_E7_IdCart].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13562a
string.body: Shongshon Necklace[pl:"Necklaces"];A necklace with a pendant. A name and some text has been engraved into the pendant. If you take this item to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Mairing_E], you will receive a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13563a
string.body: Mining Tool[pl:"Tools"] at the Ramparts;Equipment located at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_FOBJ_E3_MineToolBox].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13564a
string.body: Ore Pouch;A pouch belonging to[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_E4_Shulack_Keep_Id_As_64_An]. The pouch is filled with ore.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13567a
string.body: Granker Fur;Fur of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_E4_BigHornDeer_64_n]. It appears to be thick and warm.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12509a
string.body: Heavy Drakan Sword;This type of sword is used by the Balaur. This item should be discarded once [STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_A4_KahrunShield] has been destroyed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12512a
string.body: Fragments of the Blue Core;Fragments of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_B5_FanaIdgel]. They were collected by the Dragonbound at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12513a
string.body: Fang[pl:"Fangs"] of a Trained Taiga;A fang of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B5_F_DireBeast], trained by members of the Dragonbound in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12515a
string.body: Vessel of the Rune Tribe;Vessel used by the Rune Tribe. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B6_Baku_62_An] swallowed this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12521a
string.body: Bandana of the High-Ranking Daeva;Jakahn's headwear, which Kiker lost. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B7_Merdion_62_n] had swallowed this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12523a
string.body: Mission Map[pl:"Maps"] of the desolate camp;A Mission Map of the Beritra Army. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B8_Vritra_Ri_NamedQ_62_An] owns it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_12525a
string.body: Staff[pl:"Staffs"] of Purification;Iroas obtained this staff from Portis. The staff weakens Id energy if used near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B8], the site of the Id explosion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22509a
string.body: Simple Drakan Sword;The common sword among the Balaur. This item should be discarded once[%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_A2_KahrunShield] has been destroyed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22512a
string.body: Blue Core Shard[pl:"Shards"];The shard of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_B5_FanaIdgel], which was collected by the Dragonbound at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22513a
string.body: Molar[pl:"Molars"] of a Trained Taiga;A molar of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B5_F_DireBeast], trained by members of the Dragonbound in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22515a
string.body: Tableware of the Rune Tribe;Tableware used by the Rune Tribe. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B6_Baku_62_An] swallowed this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22521a
string.body: Elegant Head Covering;Niel's head covering, which Pagut lost. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B1_Merdion_62_n] swallowed this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22523a
string.body: Mission Map[pl:"Maps"] of the destroyed Beritra Sentry Post;A mission map belonging to the Beritra Soldiers, owned by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B2_Vritra_Ri_NamedQ_62_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22525a
string.body: Staff[pl:"Staffs"] of Purification;Balbrin obtained this rod from a priest. The rod weakens Id energy if used near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_B2], the site of the Id explosion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13550a
string.body: Jormungand Bundle of Incense;A bundle carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A2_Fana] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_A4_Fana]. It is used for brainwashing.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13554a
string.body: Akad's Research Journal;Akad wrote this research report himself. He is currently in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5A_FOBJ_F_TiamatBox].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13555a
string.body: Petrified Idgel Clump;Idgel which has congealed into a hard lump in the body of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_F_Test] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5A_F].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_39601a
string.body: Idium Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];A fragment that was unearthed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Idgel_Q39601]. The purpose of this item is unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_39605a
string.body: Robust[pl:"Robust"] Wood[pl:"Wood"];A large, hard piece of wood taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Wood_Q39605].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_39608a
string.body: Intact Brick;Building material which is still in good condition. This brick is so hard that it could be used as a foundation stone. You can find it at the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Wall_Q39608].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_39701a
string.body: Shattered[pl:"Shattered"] Idium;A fragment that was unearthed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Idgel_Q39601]. The purpose of this item is unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_39708a
string.body: Foul-Smelling Rubbish;Rubbish taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Garbage_Q39708]. It smells terrible.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_39709a
string.body: False[pl:"False"] Stone[pl:"Stones"];A stone from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Wall_Q39608]. It has many cracks and was thus rejected as building material.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23001a
string.body: Ramparts Research Material[pl:"Materials"];The Ramparts that the Rune Tribe built can be investigated using this material. This item can be obtained by examining the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_FOBJ_A3_Wall].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23002a
string.body: Leather of the Snowy Bosbears;This piece of leather is great for keeping one's body warm. It can be taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A1_MosbearMom_63_An] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A1_MosbearMom_64_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23009a
string.body: Raw Meat of the Ramparts Abex;Fresh meat from the Ramparts Abex. Can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A2_Fethlot_64_n] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A2_Fethlot_65_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23011a
string.body: Research Report about the Nevilim Plateau;This research report was written by a researcher in the 40th Beritra Army. It provides information about the weapons created by the Rune Tribe and the Nevilim. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_A4_Vri].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23013a
string.body: Nevilim Research Material;Tissue Sample taken from a frozen Nevilim. This sample can be obtained by examining [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Nepilim].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23017a
string.body: Wrecked Idgel Core[pl:"Cores"];Pieces of an Idgel core, which was wrecked in a failed Idgel experiment. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_B3_Wildlycan].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23018a
string.body: Robust Idgel Cube[pl:"Cubes"];A container which can be used to store Idgel. You can obtain it by examining the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_FOBJ_B1_Idgel].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23020a
string.body: Contaminated Idgel Core Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];The fragment of an Idgel core, taken from a contaminated Drakan. It seems to be useful for researching the cause of the Balaur contamination. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_B2_VriZomb].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23021a
string.body: Research Report[pl:"Reports"];The research report of the Beritra Army's Intelligence Service, which contains information about the experiments in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_B2]. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_B2_Vri2_Tanker_Fi_DD_65_An] carry this item on their person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23027a
string.body: Beritran Insignia[pl:"Insignia"];An insignia worn by the soldiers in the Beritra army. You can take this item from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_B3_Vri].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23031a
string.body: Purified Idgel;Idgel, purified by a magical force. It exudes particularly strong energy. It can be obtained by investigating in the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_FOBJ_D1_UnstableIdgel] area.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23036a
string.body: Dragonbound Necklace;A sign of faith, worn by the members of the Dragonbound. [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_D2_Vri_Fanatic] is in possession of this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23037a
string.body: Kinah Pouch;A pouch used by Shugos to hold money. This item can be obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_D2_Vri2_Fanatic_Fi_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23041a
string.body: Shugo Kinah Pouch;Pouch used by Shugos to hold Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23044a
string.body: Stolen Items;The Strigik have stolen these items from the Shugos. You can obtain them from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5B_E_Babar].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23052a
string.body: Insignia of the Material Supplies Troop;An insignia that indicates members of the Beritra Army's Supplies Troop. You can take this item from members of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_F123_Vri].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23053a
string.body: Mission Plan[pl:"Plans"] for supplying Siege Weapons;A document containing the plans for supplying siege weapons. The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f1_Vri2_Poison_As_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae] carries the plan on his person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23053b
string.body: Mission Plan[pl:"Plans"] for supplying Transport Materials;A document containing the plans for supplying Transport Materials. The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f2_Vri2_Weabind_Ri_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae] carries the plan on his person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23053c
string.body: Mission Plan[pl:"Plans"] for supplying War Materials;A document containing the plans for supplying war materials. The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f3_Vri2_Confuse_El_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae] carries the plan on his person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23056a
string.body: Splinter of the Aether Orb;The splinter of the Aether Orb exudes a magical force. The members of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_F4_Vri] carry this item on their person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23057a
string.body: Goldrinyerk War Materials;A chest with Goldrinyerk seals. This item can be found at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_F4_TR].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23300a
string.body: Report about Idgel Experiments;A research report about the contaminated area of the 40th Legion. The report can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_b2_Vri_Weabind_Ri_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23307a
string.body: Operation order[pl:"orders"]of the 40th Legion;A document containing the battle strategy. This item can be taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_A4_Vri_Poison_As_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23317a
string.body: Secret Message[pl:"Messages"];The only things written on this note are a time and a place. This information seems to be about a meeting. Obtain this message from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_D2_Vri_Fanatic_Fi_SN_NmdQ_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23327a
string.body: Orders of the Vasti Troop;This battle plan is written in Balaur writing. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_d1_Vri_Poison_As_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23336a
string.body: New Balaur Weapon[pl:"Weapons"];This weapon was stolen from the Beritra Army. Its quality is particularly good. You can take this item from members of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_F123_Vri].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23337a
string.body: List[pl:"Lists"] of Beritra War Materials;The status of the Beritra Army's war materials supply is noted on this list. This item can be taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f3_Vri2_Confuse_El_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23341a
string.body: Operation order[pl:"orders"] of the 1st Troop;This mission plan is written in Balaur writing. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f4_Vri_Poison_As_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23345a
string.body: Strategy Plan[pl:"Plans"] of the Murak Troop;A mission plan for the First Troop. The content is somewhat different to other mission plans. This item can be taken from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_f4_Vri_Confuse_El_SN_NmdQ_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30035
string.body: Empyrean Aether Revolver Components;Siel's Aether Revolver and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01]. If the two are joined, the weapon's hidden powers are unleashed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30037
string.body: Empyrean Aether Cannon Components;Siel's Aether Cannon and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01]. If the two are joined, the weapon's hidden powers are unleashed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30039
string.body: Empyrean Stringed Instrument Component[pl:"Components"];Siel's Sovereign Stringed Instrument and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01]. If the two are joined, the weapon's hidden powers are unleashed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30135
string.body: Empyrean Aether Revolver Components;Siel's Aether Revolver and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. If the two are joined, the weapon's hidden powers are unleashed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30137
string.body: Empyrean Aether Cannon Components;Siel's Aether Cannon and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. If the two are joined, the weapon's hidden powers are unleashed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30139
string.body: Empyrean Stringed Instrument Component[pl:"Components"];Siel's Sovereign Stringed Instrument and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. If the two are joined, the weapon's hidden powers are unleashed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30247_All
string.body: Aether Revolver Materials;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01] and Siel's Shining Aether Revolver are needed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30248_All
string.body: Aether Cannon Materials;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01] and Siel's Shining Aether Cannon are needed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30249_All
string.body: Stringed Instrument Materials;The following materials are needed to create a powerful weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01] and Siel's Gleaming Sovereign Stringed Instrument.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_39603a
string.body: Kokonat[pl:"Kokonats"];A ripe fruit gathered from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_G1_Ratman_Gather_63_n]. It smells good.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_39610a
string.body: Beritra Soldier Weapon;There are blood stains on this item. [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_B2_VriZomb] used to own this weapon once.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_39713a
string.body: Cleaning Powder;This powder exudes a mysterious energy. This item can be used at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_49601a
string.body: Cracked[pl:"Cracked"] Idium;A fragment that was unearthed at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Idgel_Q39601]. The purpose of this item is unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_49603a
string.body: Ripe Kokonat[pl:"Kokonats"];A ripe fruit gathered from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_C1_Ratman_Gather_63_n]. It smells good.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_49605a
string.body: Hard[pl:"Hard"] Wood[pl:"Wood"];A large, hard piece of wood taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Wood_Q39605].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_49608a
string.body: Optimal Brick;A fairly well-preserved brick, brought from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Wall_Q39608]. This brick is made so well and is so sturdy that it could be used as a foundation stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_49610a
string.body: Beritra Soldier Weapon;There are blood stains on this weapon. The item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5b_B2_VriZomb].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_49701a
string.body: Shattered[pl:"Shattered"] Idium;A fragment that was found at the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Idgel_Q39601]. The purpose of this item is unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_49708a
string.body: Foul-Smelling Rubbish;Rubbish taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Garbage_Q39708]. It smells terrible.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_49709a
string.body: False Brick;This building material is as light as wood and emits a strange smell. It can be found in the [plur] [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5a_Wall_Q39608].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_49713a
string.body: Cleaning Powder;This powder exudes a mysterious energy. This item can be used at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_SZ_G1_001].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23054A
string.body: Quage's Report[pl:"Reports"];A mission report written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Quage_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_23054B
string.body: Mission Report[pl:"Reports"];Report bearing information about the whole battle situation. This report was written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Ivolk_E] and somebody manipulated its contents.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23060A
string.body: Dirty[pl:"Dirty"] Book[pl:"Books"];The book contains records written in Shugo writing. This item can be taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5B_G_Alligator_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23063A
string.body: Wallinerk's Report;Report from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_wallring_E]. This report contains information about the status of the repair work at the Ramparts.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_23064A
string.body: Tablet of Gratitude from Pandarunerk;A symbol of gratitude from Pandarunerk, the President of Goldrinyerk Limited.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22537a
string.body: Worn Nevilim Fragments;These fragments can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_C2_Nebilim_63_An]. They are old and worn.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23051a
string.body: Secret Letter;A letter with a stamped steal.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_22827a
string.body: Strong Brick;This building material can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5A_B3_Souledstone_64_An]. The brick appears to be hard and resilient.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23562a
string.body: Document[pl:"Documents"] of Building Supervision;The document names the person responsible for the project - [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Devring_E]. It also contains all important information about the railroad which connects Bright Town and Pandarung.

string.name: STR_DIC_COIN_SILVERLIN_01
string.body: Silverinerk Insignia;You can obtain this item by joining [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Silverlin] and completing missions for them.

string.name: STR_DIC_COIN_GREENHAT_01
string.body: Insignia of the Green Hat Alliance;You can receive this item by carrying out missions as a member of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Greenhat].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18013a
string.body: Mutated Life Energy[pl:"Energies"];A blue core exuding a cold energy. You can obtain it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync1_A_N_65_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync1_B_N_65_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync2_A1_N_65_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync2_B_N_65_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync3_A_N_65_Ah] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync3_B_N_65_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_18011a
string.body: Tiamat's Research Journal[pl:"Journals"];Research reports made by Tiamat, containing results from the Idgel Research Lab.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28013a
string.body: Mutated[pl:"Mutated"] Life Core[pl:"Cores"];A blue core exuding cold energy. You can obtain it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync1_A_N_65_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync1_B_N_65_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync2_A1_N_65_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync2_B_N_65_Ah], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync3_A_N_65_Ah] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_BIDF5_R2_Sync3_B_N_65_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_28011a
string.body: Tiamat's Research Record[pl:"Records"];Research records made by Tiamat, containing results from the Idgel Research Lab.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18001a
string.body: Idgel Core Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Part of an Idgel core that contains a small quantity of Idgel.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18002a
string.body: Research Journal of the Rune Tribe;A research report about Idgel experiments. It is difficult to decipher as the pages have already faded.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28001a
string.body: Fragmented Idgel Core[pl:"Cores"];Part of an Idgel core that contains a small quantity of Idgel.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28002a
string.body: Research Records of the Rune Tribe;Report about the Idgel experiments. It is hard to decipher as the pages have faded.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_IUPierroD_CANDY
string.body: Transformation Candy[pl:"Candies"];A special item which you can use to transform into a harlequin.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13612a
string.body: Gritt's Secret Cosument;Document written by Gritt the Balaur. It contains secret information about Beritra.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_13613a
string.body: Confidential[pl:"Confidential"] Document[pl:"Documents"] of the Beritra Army;This confidential document of the Beritra Army is written in the language of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13614a
string.body: Strong Idium Ore;It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_AncientGolem_65_An]. It contains the powers of Id.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13616a
string.body: Rune Relic of Fury;Relics of a Rune Spirit. You can obtain them from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Shadow_65_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_ShadowH_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23612a
string.body: Gritt's Secret Records;Document by Gritt the Balaur. They contain secret information about Beritra.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_23613a
string.body: Secret Document[pl:"Documents"] of the Beritra Army;This secret document of the Beritra Army is written in the language of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23614a
string.body: Idium Fragment with a high degree of Purity;It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_AncientGolem_65_An]. It exudes the power of Id.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_23616a
string.body: Cursed Rune Relic;Relics of a Rune Spirit. You can obtain them from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Shadow_65_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_ShadowH_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13651a
string.body: Stone Fragment[pl:"Fragments"] of the Rune Tribe;Shard of a special stone, used as building material by the Rune Tribe. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_H1_Stone].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13652a
string.body: Bone Powder[pl:"Powders"] of Rancour;A special bone powder that you can obtain from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BLDF5_CoffinB_Sum_65_An] in [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_CoffinB_65_n] and from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BLDF5_CoffinA_Sum_65_An] in [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_CoffinA_65_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13653a
string.body: Kataluna Healing Herb;A special cave plant that grows in the Katalam underground. It has extraordinary healing powers. This item can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_A1_Plant].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_12506a
string.body: Avsada's Journal;This document can be obtained from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriCU_As_SN_65_An]. It was written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Avsada_E] personally and contains important information.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_22506a
string.body: Egant's Records;Obtain this document from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VriCU_As_SN_65_An]. The records were made by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5a_Egant_E] personally and contain important information.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_13604a
string.body: Kurius' Letter[pl:"Letters"];A letter from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Kurius_E] to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Hadius_E]. The letter should really be kept confidential, but you could probably sneak a glance at it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_23604a
string.body: Otur's Letter[pl:"Letters"];A letter from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Oturu_E] to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Brief_E]. The letter should really be kept confidential, but you could probably sneak a glance at it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13601a
string.body: Ration Order;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Pudirung_E] needs this document. It states the number of additional rations that are needed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13606a
string.body: Glowing Idium;Idium ore that can only be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_Idium]. It seems that it only exists in the underground.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13607a
string.body: Slimy Clodworm Innards;You can obtain these by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Clodworm_65_An]. A unique ingredient for food.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13609a
string.body: Report on Id Pollution;A document of unknown origin. Obtain this item by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VrDrZombID_Fi_65_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VrDrZombID_Wi_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23601a
string.body: Additional Rations Order;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Under_Pudirung_E] needs this document. It states the number of additional rations that are needed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23606a
string.body: Softly Glowing Idium;Idium ore that can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_LDF5_Under_FOBJ_Idium]. It seems that it only exists in the underground.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23607a
string.body: Squishy Clodworm Innards;The innards of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Clodworm_65_An]. No one would ever think of using them as an ingredient for food.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23609a
string.body: Report on Id Pollution;A document of unknown origin. Obtain this item by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VrDrZombID_Fi_65_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_VrDrZombID_Wi_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13655a
string.body: Purified Idium Ore;The Idium Ore is digested, and thus purified, by the Klaw in the Katalam Underground. [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Neuth1_Worker_65_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Neuth2_Abyss_65_An] carry it on their person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16930a
string.body: Part[pl:"Parts"] of Hyperion;A part of the ancient weapon of the Rune Tribe. You can find it in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDRuneweapon].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26930a
string.body: Part[pl:"Parts"] of the Ancient Weapon;This is a part of Hyperion, the ancient weapon of the Rune Tribe. You can find this part of Hyperion in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDRuneweapon].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16921a
string.body: Research Journal[pl:"Journals"] of the Rune Witch;The Rune Witch Grendal records her research in this journal. Her desire is to resurrect her beloved Narcis. She can be found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_Rune] and always carries the book on her person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26921a
string.body: Tool Component[pl:"Components"] for Summoning Spirits;A tool used by the Rune Witch Grendal to resurrect her dead lover, Narcis. She is in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5_Under_Rune] and carries this object on her person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13510a
string.body: Katalam Conquest Diary;Obtain it by combining the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13511a] with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13512a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13513a] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13514a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13511a
string.body: First Patrol report;You receive this report when doing a special mission for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Portis_E]. Combine this report with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13512a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13513a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13514a] to obtain the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13510a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13512a
string.body: Second Patrol report;You receive this report when doing a special mission for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Pepe_E]. Combine this report with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13511a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13513a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13514a] to obtain the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13510a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13513a
string.body: Third Patrol report;You receive this report when doing a special mission for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Portis_E]. Combine this report with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13511a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13512a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13514a] to obtain the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13510a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13514a
string.body: Fourth Patrol report;You receive this report when doing a special mission for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Pepe_E]. Combine this report with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13511a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13512a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13513a] to obtain the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_13510a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13515a
string.body: Pashid's Claw;After successfully defending the Steel Wall Bastion and killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_DragonRider_Chief_N_65_Al], a Steel Wall Bastion Treasure Chest appears from which you can retrieve this Claw.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23500a
string.body: Bard's Order;An order that comes from [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF5a_Bard_Commander] personally. It is addressed to the Captains of the Katalam Cleanup Squad, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard01_D], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard03_D] and[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard06_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23510a
string.body: Katalam Conquest Diary;Obtain it by combining the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23511a] with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23512a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23513a] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23514a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23511a
string.body: First Cleanup Report;You receive this report when doing a special mission for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Stelman_E]. Combine this report with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23512a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23513a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23514a] to obtain the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23510a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23512a
string.body: Second Cleanup Report;You receive this report when doing a special mission for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5A_Phone_E]. Combine this report with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23511a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23513a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23514a] to obtain the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23510a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23513a
string.body: Third Cleanup Report;You receive this report when doing a special mission for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Stelman_E]. Combine this report with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23511a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23512a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23514a] to obtain the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23510a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23514a
string.body: Fourth Cleanup Report;You receive this report when doing a special mission for [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Phone_E]. Combine this report with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23511a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23512a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23513a] to obtain the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_23510a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23515a
string.body: Pashid's Horn;After successfully defending the Steel Wall Bastion and killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_TD_DragonRider_Chief_N_65_Al], a Steel Wall Bastion Treasure Chest appears from which you can retrieve this Horn.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13500a
string.body: Tirins' Order;An order that comes from [%dic:STR_DIC_LDF5a_Tiryns_Commander] personally. It is addressed to the Captains of the Katalam Patrol, [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard01_L], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard03_L] and[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Village_Guard06_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_13520a
string.body: Letter with Secret Information;A Balaur letter obtained in the battle against the Beritra Army. It contains information on the Beritra Army's activities and the Asmodian spies.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13528a
string.body: Devastated Area Investigation Report;A report on the Devastated Area in the Katalam Underground written by the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13528b
string.body: Canal Area Investigation Report;A report on the Canal Area in the Katalam Underground written by the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13528c
string.body: Garrison Investigation Report;A report on the Lata Troop Garrison in the Katalam Underground written by the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13529a
string.body: Witch's Ring of Strength;A ring held by Grendal, the witch in Runadium. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Rune_FrostNmd_2_N_Ma_65_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13529b
string.body: Pure Hyperion Core;A pure Hyperion core from the old weapon in Katalamize. Obtain it by destroying the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRuneWP_AncientArm_N_65_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13529c
string.body: Hard Artillery Parts;Artillery parts from a siege weapon developed by the Beritra Army that appears near Jormungand's Bridge. Obtain the parts by destroying the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U1_UltimateSW_N_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13529d
string.body: Relic Chest of the ancient Rune Tribe;A Relic Chest of the ancient Rune Tribe, concealed in the Refuge of the Rune Tribe. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_VriIU_Wi_N_65_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_23520a
string.body: Letter with Secret Information;A Balaur letter obtained in the battle against the Beritra Army. It contains information on the Beritra Army's activities and the Elyos spies.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23528a
string.body: Devastated Area Research Report;A report on the Devastated Area in the Katalam Underground written by the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23528b
string.body: Canal Area Research Report;A report on the Canal Area in the Katalam Underground written by the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23528c
string.body: Garrison Research Report;A report on the Lata Troop Garrison in the Katalam Underground written by the Beritra Army Reconnaissance Troop. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23529a
string.body: Witch's Ring of Rule;A ring held by the witch in Runadium. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Rune_FrostNmd_2_N_Ma_65_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23529b
string.body: Concentrated Hyperion Core;A core of concentrated Idgel. Obtain it by destroying the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRuneWP_AncientArm_N_65_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23529c
string.body: Sturdy Artillery Parts;Artillery parts from a siege weapon developed by the Beritra Army that appears near Jormungand's Bridge. Obtain the parts by destroying the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U1_UltimateSW_N_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23529d
string.body: Ancient Relic Chest of the Rune Tribe;A Relic Chest of the ancient Rune Tribe, concealed in the Refuge of the Rune Tribe. Obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_VriIU_Wi_N_65_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16982a
string.body: Journal of the Rune High Priest;The legacy of the Rune, carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_Vri_N_65_all]. The language of the Rune is hard to understand, but it is assumed that the document discusses Idgel.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26982a
string.body: Records of the Rune High Priest;The legacy of the Rune, carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_Vri_N_65_all]. The language of the Rune is hard to understand, but it is assumed that the document discusses Idgel.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18913a
string.body: Ancient Weapon Blueprint[pl:"Blueprints"];A blueprint that can be taken from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Shugo_Nurse_65_Ae]. The blueprint appears to contain more details about the ancient weapon developed long ago.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18914a
string.body: Rusty[pl:"Rusty"] Weapon Part[pl:"Parts"];A part that was removed from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_STR_IDVritra_FOBJ_Ancient_warmachine]. It could be of use to the research of the Idgel-powered weapon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18916a
string.body: Ornate Seal of the Chief of Staff;A seal received after eliminating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Guardian_65_Ae2_Nmd]. This seal is only awarded to high-ranking members of the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28913a
string.body: Ancient Weapon Design Drawing[pl:"Drawings"];A design drawing that can be acquired from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Shugo_Nurse_65_Ae]. The drawing appears to contain more details about the ancient weapon developed long ago.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28914a
string.body: Corroded[pl:"Corroded"] Weapon Part[pl:"Parts"];A part that was removed from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_STR_IDVritra_FOBJ_Ancient_warmachine]. It could be of use to the research of the Idgel-powered weapon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28916a
string.body: Detailed Seal of the Chief of Staff;A seal received after eliminating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Guardian_65_Ae2_Nmd]. This seal is only awarded to high-ranking members of the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_IDLDF5b_TD_Map_Q28034
string.body: Strategy of the Steel Wall Bastion;A page torn from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLDF5b_TD_Map_Q18034]. It shows the strategic plan to defend the Steel Wall Bastion against the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5_idruneweapon_01
string.body: Mysterious[pl:"Mysterious"] Crystal[pl:"Crystals"] of Katalamize;A crystal which you will need in order to enter Katalamize. Elyos can obtain the pattern from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Lv11_SpecialSeller] and Asmodians can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dv11_SpecialSeller].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5_idunder_rune_01
string.body: Mysterious[pl:"Mysterious"] Crystal[pl:"Crystals"] of Runadium;A crystal which you will need to enter Runadium. It can be manufactured. Elyos can obtain the pattern from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Lv11_SpecialSeller] and Asmodians can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dv11_SpecialSeller].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_coin_pvp_01
string.body: Battle Medal[pl:"Medals"];A medal for Daevas who have accomplished much in battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_key_Idldf5_Under_02_start_a
string.body: Key to the Sacred Tomb;A key that may be contained in the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_E_Box_Start]. You can enter the Sacred Tomb with this key. It vanishes after a period of time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_key_Idldf5_Under_02_start_b
string.body: Key to the Tomb of Wisdom;A key that may be contained in the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_E_Box_Start]. You can enter the Tomb of Wisdom with this key. It vanishes after a period of time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_key_Idldf5_Under_02_start_c
string.body: Key to the Damaged Tomb;A key that may be contained in the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_E_Box_Start]. You can enter the Damaged Tomb with this key. It vanishes after a period of time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18931a
string.body: Weapon[pl:"Weapons"] from the Ashunatal Dredgion;A weapon from the Tiamat Forces that is located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDdreadgion_04_DrakanWeapon_Q18931].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28931a
string.body: Weapon[pl:"Weapons"] from the Ashunatal Dredgion;A weapon from the Tiamat Forces that is located in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDdreadgion_04_DrakanWeapon_Q18931].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_01
string.body: Marble[pl:"Marbles"] of the Sillus Fortress;Combine it with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_02] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_03] to receive a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_fortress_04]. If you took part in the defence of the Sillus Fortress, you can swap this Marble for a chest with first or second rank rewards.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_02
string.body: Marble[pl:"Marbles"] of the Bassen Fortress;Combine it with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_01] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_03] to receive a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_fortress_04]. If you took part in the defence of the Bassen Fortress, you can swap this Marble for a chest with first or second rank rewards.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_03
string.body: Marble[pl:"Marbles"] of the Prades Fortress;Combine it with the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_01] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_02] to receive a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_fortress_04]. If you took part in the defence of the Prades Fortress, you can swap this Marble for a chest with first or second rank rewards.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_fortress_04
string.body: Marble[pl:"Marbles"] of Chaos;An marble obtained by combining the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_02] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_03]. To receive these marbles you must take part in the battles for the Sillus, Bassen and Prades Fortresses and accomplish great deeds.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Key_IDLDF5_TD_Door_01
string.body: Artillery Generator[pl:"Generators"];A device required to use the defence artillery at the Steel Wall Bastion. The artillery cannot be activated without the generator.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Key_IDLDF5_TD_Door_02
string.body: Starter[pl:"Starters"] for the Siege Tank[pl:"Tanks"];A device for activating the siege tanks deployed by the Beritra Army's Pashid Unit to capture the Steel Wall Bastion. The starter is required in order to use one of the 43rd Beritra Army's siege tanks.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Key_Event_Alchemist
string.body: Key to Treasure Chest;A key that unlocks the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Event_Alchemist_treasurebox]. You get it by combining a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_01] with a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_01
string.body: Alchemy Essence;A magical essence used by alchemists. Combine it with a piece of lead to receive a bag with a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Key_Event_Alchemist].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_02
string.body: Piece of Lead;A piece of metal that is used frequently by alchemists. Combine it with Alchemy Essence to receive a bag with a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Key_Event_Alchemist].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Event_Alchemist_wrap
string.body: Alchemist's Experiment Bag;An item used by alchemists of the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Event_Alchemist_01]. It can be obtained throughout Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance
string.body: Instant Draw[pl:"Draws"] for the Atreia Lottery;A scratch card issued by the Atreia Lottery. Carefully scratch off the silver coating to see the prize. Instant Draws come in three different types, [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance_300], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance_100] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance_5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance_300
string.body: Mega Kinah 300;One of the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance]. You can buy up to 10 of these tickets per day for 1 million Kinah each. The first prize is 300 million Kinah, the second prize is 100 million Kinah, the third prize is 5 million Kinah, the fourth prize is 1.5 million Kinah and the fifth prize is 10,000 Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance_100
string.body: Mega Kinah 100;One of the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance]. You can buy up to 20 of these tickets per day for 100,000 Kinah each. The first prize is 100 million Kinah, the second prize is 10 million Kinah, the third prize is 1 million Kinah, the fourth prize is 250,000 Kinah and the fifth prize is 100 Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance_5
string.body: Mega Kinah 5;One of the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance]. You can buy up to 10 of these tickets per day for 1 million Kinah each. The first prize is 5 million Kinah, the second prize is 2.2 million Kinah, the third prize is 130,000 Kinah, the fourth prize is 110,000 Kinah and the fifth prize is 100 Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_80405a
string.body: Soul[pl:"Souls"] of a[pl:"the"] Burnt Zombie[pl:"Zombies"];A soul that can be taken from Burnt Zombies. Obtain them by eliminating the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_ZombieQ_46_An] locked in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2a_FOBJ_Q1092].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_80424a
string.body: Nagarant Bloodstain[pl:"Bloodstains"];A stain of dried Nagarant Blood. Obtain it by killing the Bakarma Legion Nagarants in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_H].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_80438a
string.body: Secretion of the Colourful Arachna[pl:"Arachna"];Obtain this secretion by killing the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF2A_OctasideTigerD_46_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_world_event_l_bond
string.body: Shugo Warranty;A warranty issued by a Shugo. You get it by getting ice for Scrooge. This item can be exchanged with Shugos to whom it means something for a certain period after the Summer Festival has ended.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_world_event_d_bond
string.body: Shugo Warranty;A warranty issued by a Shugo. You get it by getting ice for Scrooge. This item can be exchanged with Shugos to whom it means something for a certain period after the Summer Festival has ended.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_assembly_world_event_ice_piece
string.body: Solid Ice;This ice can only be smashed with an [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_world_event_icehammer_piece].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_assembly_world_event_icehammer_piece
string.body: Ice Hammer;A hammer for smashing [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_world_event_ice_piece].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30041
string.body: Empyrean Aether Key Components;Siel's Sovereign Aether Key and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01]. If the two are joined, the weapon's hidden powers are unleashed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30250_All
string.body: Aether Key Materials;The following materials are needed to create a powerful weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01] and Siel's Gleaming Sovereign Aether Key.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30141
string.body: Empyrean Aether Key Components;Siel's Sovereign Aether Key and a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. If the two are joined, the weapon's hidden powers are unleashed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16992a
string.body: Dynatum Plate[pl:"Plates"];This plate contains information about the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U3_Boss_N_65_Ah] in the Rune Shield Tower. It is where all the information on the Beritra Army's Id technology can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26992a
string.body: Dynatum Circuit[pl:"Circuits"];This circuit contains information on the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U3_Boss_N_65_Ah] in the Rune Shield Tower. It is where all the information on the Beritra Army's Id technology can be found.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4338a
string.body: Spiner Tail[pl:"Tails"];The tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LobsterReD_25_An]. It is black, shiny and very resilient.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4338b
string.body: Cursed Necklace[pl:"Necklaces"];It is said that whosoever owns this necklace will come into great wealth. However, there also lies a terrible curse upon the necklace that will cause its owner to lose everyone they love and remain alone for the rest of their life.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4542c
string.body: Aika's Key;You can obtain this key by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SeirenNamedDQ_44_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9562a
string.body: [Event] Clue[pl:"Clues"] from the Katalam Informer;A [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Event_Shulack_As_03] from Katalam has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9563a
string.body: [Event] Clue[pl:"Clues"] from the Gelkmaros Informer;A [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Event_Shulack_As_02] from Gelkmaros has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9564a
string.body: [Event] Clue[pl:"Clues"] from the Katalam Informer;A [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Event_Shulack_As_03] from Katalam has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9565a
string.body: [Event] Clue[pl:"Clues"] from the Inggison Informer;A [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Event_Shulack_As_01] from Inggison has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3547a
string.body: Crystal[pl:"Crystals"] of the Poisoned Elim;These crystals can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_36_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Agrint_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3340a
string.body: Destruction Order[pl:"Orders"];An encrypted order outlining the mission to destroy the Lepharist construction base. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparKn_40_An] has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3548a
string.body: Scale[pl:"Scales"] of the Research Object;Can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ID5R_PerfectWaBossQ_45_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11304a
string.body: Balaur Order[pl:"Orders"];This order is carried by[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCatacombsH_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24090a
string.body: Hourglass of Space and Time;Designed by Protectress Oriata, this golden hourglass lets you travel back in time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24095a
string.body: Golden Hourglass;Designed by Protectress Oriata, this hourglass lets you travel back in time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24081b
string.body: Part[pl:"Parts"] of a Fragmented Gapemaw;Parts that you can receive by defeating the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Monster_Q20061A] near the Heart of Gravity.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24080a
string.body: Idgel Purification Device Part[pl:"Parts"];One of the parts of the Idgel Purification Device. You can feel the Id pulsing.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24071b
string.body: Idgel Purification Device[pl:"Devices"];You can feel the Id pulsing. The device is damaged and is not working right now.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24071a
string.body: Stone Tablet[pl:"Tablets"] featuring Records about the Protectress;They are [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4a_FOBJ_DefenderRecord], inscribed on an ancient, weathered stone tablet emanating a divine power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24070a
string.body: Idgel Purification Device[pl:"Devices"];You can feel the Id pulsing. This item can be taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Q20050all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24030a
string.body: Ancient Orb of Divinity;This orb was created before the Great Catastrophe, and is imbued with divine blessing. You obtain by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF2A_TesinonSeamanNMDQ_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24051c
string.body: Key[pl:"Keys"] to the Secret Harbour;This small metal item can be taken off [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeA_LehparKnD_37_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KnA_LehparKnD_37_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24062a
string.body: Suspicious Balaur Item[pl:"Items"];A suspicious item found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_DF4_Drakan_vilall]. A symbol resembling that of the Mitrakand Dragonbound is engraved on it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24012B
string.body: Black Claw Headdress;A MuMu and Black Claw Tribe accessory. Can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWarriorS_13_An][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWarriorS_11_An][%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_11_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_13_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24012C
string.body: MuMu Belt[pl:"Belts"];A belt worn by all MuMu. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererM_11_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererMS_13_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererMS_11_An] have one.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24013a
string.body: Hunter's Poison Brew[pl:"Brews"];An odourless, transparent liquid. It should be used in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24014a
string.body: Abija's Staff[pl:"Staffs"];A staff used by Mau shaman Abija. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanShamanSNamed_19_Ae] still has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24021a
string.body: Ancient Archon Weapon[pl:"Weapons"];A weapon the Asmodians used immediately after the Great Catastrophe. [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_UNdeadLightFiD_26_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UNdeadLightHighFiD_26_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UNdeadLightWiD_26_An] have one.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24021b
string.body: Ancient Archon Armour[pl:"Armour"];Armour used by the Asmodians immediately after the Great Catastrophe. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Undeaddark_qDNamedQ_28_An] has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24021c
string.body: Herbal Powder of Peace;A mixture of a variety of powdered herbs. When sprinkled between the two pillars of the tower in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_2], it can appease the spirits.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023a
string.body: Storm Key[pl:"Keys"];A key in the possession of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Elementalwater3NMDQ_31_An]. You need this key to enter the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying_SUB_2] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023b
string.body: Red Crystal Key[pl:"Keys"];A key in the possession of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalEarth3NamedD_32_Ae]. It opens the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying_SUB_3] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023c
string.body: Flame Key[pl:"Keys"];A key in the possession of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalFire4NamedQ_33_Ae]. You need it to enter the Fire Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023all
string.body: Temple Key[pl:"Keys"];Includes the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023b] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023c].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24031a
string.body: Munin's Rift Analyser[pl:"Analysers"];A device for inspecting an Abyss Gate. It can be used in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_ItemUseArea_Q24031].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24031b
string.body: Aurtri's Rift Analyser[pl:"Analysers"];A device for inspecting an Abyss Gate. It can be used in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_ItemUseArea_Q24031].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24031c
string.body: Tyr's Rift Analyser[pl:"Analysers"];A device for inspecting an Abyss Gate. It can be used in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_ItemUseArea_Q24031].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24052a
string.body: Elim Anoramas' Essence[pl:"Essences"];It looks like a dried, brown fruit. It feels warm.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24052b
string.body: Elim Triminos' Essence[pl:"Essences"];It gleams and looks like a red fruit.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24052c
string.body: Elim Etun's Essence[pl:"Essences"];The essence resembles a transparent lump of glass. It feels cold.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14014a
string.body: Kailini Potion[pl:"Potions"] of Transformation;A potion from Estino. It only works at the entrance to the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA22].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14014b
string.body: Tursin Veteran's Clue[pl:"Clues"];A crafted fragment that can be obtained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_37001all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14015a
string.body: Tursin Krall Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];This insignia is from a Krall armour from the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA23].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14016a
string.body: Seal of Destruction;A seal in the possession of the Balaur General and locked in a sealed room. It can be used to destroy the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_14].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14023a
string.body: Lightning Wall Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_14023_all]. A piece of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3] wall. You can obtain it from Poison Amphiters and Spy Amphiters.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14023b
string.body: Wave Wall Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_14023_all]. A piece of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3] wall. You can obtain it from Crouching Eracus Gargoyles.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14023c
string.body: Wind Wall Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_14023_all]. A piece of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3] wall. You can obtain it from the Draft Spirit, Strong Sandstorm Spirit and Nimble Sandstorm Spirit.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14023d
string.body: Fire Wall Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Part of the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_14023_all]. A piece of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3] wall. Can be obtained from the Alluring Temptress and the Enticing Temptress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14024a
string.body: Gardugu's Report[pl:"Reports"];Gardugu wrote this report on the Kaidan Krall. You can obtain this document by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2Krall_28_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14025a
string.body: Plan[pl:"Plans"] for a Balaur Advance;A secret document that you can loot from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KrallScoutHK_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14026a
string.body: Mabangtah's Defence Serum;A special brew, which you can obtain from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_NPC_Mabangta].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14030a
string.body: Enhanced Marble[pl:"Marbles"] of Protection;A marble emanating a protective power. It can be made using a particular essence.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14031a
string.body: Id Sensor[pl:"Sensors"] from Poeta;This device shows the location of rich Id deposits in Poeta. It works near the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Dragonpotal_LF1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14031b
string.body: Id Sensor[pl:"Sensors"] from Verteron;This device shows the location of rich Id deposits in Verteron. It works near the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Dragonpotal_LF1a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14031c
string.body: Id Sensor[pl:"Sensors"] from Eltnen;This device shows the location of rich Id deposits in Eltnen. Use it near the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Dragonpotal_LF2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14043a
string.body: Balaur Language Potion[pl:"Potions"];Drink this potion, and you will instantly understand Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14043b
string.body: Asmodian Airship Design[pl:"Designs"];A design drawn by the Asmodians to build an airship.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14046a
string.body: Black Ember Stone[pl:"Stones"];These stones can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_RottenTreeB_29_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14051a
string.body: Lumbering Agrint Sample[pl:"Samples"];A sample that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Agrint_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14051b
string.body: Greenclaw Rotron Sample[pl:"Samples"];A sample that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052a
string.body: Kalkas' Bone Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Part of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadVigilante_Q1055]'s skeleton.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052b
string.body: Mempion's Bone Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Part of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadHerdboy_Q1055]'s skeleton.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052c
string.body: Spina's Bone Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Part of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadMaid_Q1055]'s skeleton.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052d
string.body: Ladon's Bone Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Part of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadFarmer_Q1055]'s skeleton.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052e
string.body: Urn[pl:"Urns"] of the Deceased;This vessel contains the bones of Kalkas, Mempion, Spina and Ladon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14053a
string.body: Invasion Plan[pl:"Plans"] for the Dimension Gate;A Balaur plan for an invasion through the Dimension Gate.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14062a
string.body: Clue[pl:"Clues"] from Hanarkand;An Id Seal, which can be taken from members of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_Drakan_Ae_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14070a
string.body: Clue[pl:"Clues"] from Sarpan;An Idgel Purification Device for contaminated Idgel that you can obtain from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Q10050all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14071a
string.body: Fragment[pl:"Fragments"] of the Records on the Protectress;A fragment of the scattered [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4a_FOBJ_DefenderRecord]. It looks old.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14071b
string.body: Idgel Purification Device[pl:"Devices"];A device that converts useless Idgel into useful Idgel. However, the device is damaged and does not work right now.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14080a
string.body: Clue[pl:"Clues"] from Tiamaranta;Part of an Idgel Purification Device, which can be taken from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Q14080all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14081a
string.body: Sensor Core[pl:"Cores"];This core activates the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_MagicAmp] when combined with the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_ItemUseArea_Q10060A].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14090a
string.body: Hourglass of Space and Time;Protectress Oriata's golden hourglass lets you travel back in time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14090b
string.body: Ground Id Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];You can find it by examining the[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_TiamatDie].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14090c
string.body: Shattered Id Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];You can find the Shattered Id Crystal if you examine the[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_IdPiece].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14091a
string.body: Kaisinel's Symbol[pl:"Symbols"];A symbol bestowed upon you by Lord Kaisinel. An important item and verification of your identity.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24022b
string.body: Red Abex Meat;Fresh red meat you can get by hunting [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_FethlotNmD_28_n]. You need to roast it over the fire at the Altar of Trial.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24025a
string.body: Rift Key[pl:"Keys"];The key to the Abyss Gate. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWiSilverNamedQ_39_Ae] has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24081a
string.body: Id Sensor[pl:"Sensors"];This item can be used at the Heart of Wrath. It activates the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_MagicAmp].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14044a
string.body: Artefact Activation Stone[pl:"Stones"];A magic stone for activating artefacts. These can be made using alchemy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24090b
