string.body: Extracted Id Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];You can find this fragment by examining the[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_TiamatDie].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24090c
string.body: Shattered Id Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];You can find a Shattered Id Fragment if you examine the[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_IdPiece].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24091a
string.body: Empyrean Lord Marchutan's Symbol[pl:"Symbols"];An insignia engraved with the symbol of Empyrean Lord Marchutan. It symbolises the Lord's authority.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_80539a
string.body: Steel Wall Seal[pl:"Seals"];You receive this seal when you achieve Rank S in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_promotion_vip_continue_coin
string.body: Reward Coin[pl:"Coins"];This coin is only given to Daevas who bear the Steel Wall Seal. You receive it for staying in Atreia for a certain period or by defeating bosses in Instances.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023d
string.body: Blue Crystal Key[pl:"Keys"];A key that Bolcan gave you. You can use it to open the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toIDDF2flying].

string.name: STR_DIC_l_quest_80546a
string.body: Flowers;Beautiful flowers, which Florinerk can make into a flower basket if you bring them to her.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_event_wday_flower_bouquet
string.body: Florinerk's Bouquet;A bouquet of stunning flowers. You can obtain it from Florinerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_wday_chocobox
string.body: Box of Chocolates;Filled with delicious chocolates, this box is intended only for male characters. It is a popular gift for male Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_wday_flowerbasket
string.body: Flower Basket;This basket filled with beautiful flowers is only for female characters. The perfect gift for a pretty Daeva.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_quest_80550a
string.body: Flowers;Beautiful flowers, which Florinerk can make into a flower basket if you bring them to her.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1858a
string.body: Krotan Elite Archon's Cloak[pl:"Cloaks"];A red cloak worn by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Da_gu] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Da_wi].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1859a
string.body: Krotan Elite Archon Flag[pl:"Flags"];A flag carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Da_fi]. It shows Asmodian wings and helmets emblazoned on red cloth.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1860a
string.body: Kysis Elite Archon's Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];An insignia worn by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Da_ra] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Da_wi]. You can pin it on to your clothes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1861a
string.body: Kysis Elite Archon's Weapon[pl:"Weapons"];A weapon used by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Da_fi].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1862a
string.body: Miren Elite Archon's Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];An insignia worn by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Da_ra], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Da_gu] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Da_wi]. A shield and sword are stitched onto it with red yarn.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1863a
string.body: Miren Elite Archon Kisk;A kisk in the possession of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Da_fi]. A violet wing is painted on it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2858a
string.body: Krotan Elite Guardian's Cloak[pl:"Cloaks"];A yellow cloak worn by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Li_gu] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Li_wi].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2859a
string.body: Krotan Elyos Fortress Flag[pl:"Flags"];A flag carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Li_fi]. It has an elaborate pattern of orange and green symbols on a black background.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2860a
string.body: Kysis Elite Guardian's Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];A round insignia worn by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Li_ra] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Li_wi]. A pattern of thorns is entwined around its edge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2861a
string.body: Guardian's Emblem[pl:"Emblems"];A golden insignia worn by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Li_fi]. It is shaped like a shield.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2862a
string.body: Miren Elite Guardian's Emblem[pl:"Emblems"];An emblem pinned to the epaulettes of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Li_ra], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Li_gu] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Li_wi]. It shows a castle gate and a spear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2863a
string.body: Miren Elite Guardian Kisk;A kisk in the possession of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Li_fi]. A woman with blue-green wings is painted on it.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_event_opportunity_snowball
string.body: Crystal[pl:"Crystals"] of Chance;You receive the crystal if the enhancement of [%dic:STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_snowball_01a] fails. You can give it to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_shugom_snow] in exchange for something else.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_snowball_01a
string.body: Snowflake[pl:"Snowflakes"];[%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_shugof_snow] makes them and gives them to the Daevas. Double-click to enhance.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_14150a
string.body: Engraved Stone Tablet[pl:"Tablets"];A stone tablet carving depicting the life of an ancient civilization.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_14152a
string.body: Lepharist Revolutionaries' Contaminant Sample[pl:"Samples"];A biological contaminant currently being studied by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13800a
string.body: Atmos' Letter[pl:"Letters"];It is addressed to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF5_OP1_ZoneTeleport_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13806a
string.body: Defective Generator[pl:"Generators"];A Beritra Army generator that you can obtain from the[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_A5_Vritramachine]. It seems to be defective and no longer usable. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Hyunmurung_E] would like to have it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13807a
string.body: Flame Sample[pl:"Samples"];Can be obtained by eliminating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_C2_ElementalFire3_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13809a
string.body: Scorched Bark[pl:"Barks"];A mysterious piece of bark found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_a]. It seems to be very heavily scorched.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13809b
string.body: Brittle Bark[pl:"Barks"];A piece of bark found on the[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_b]. It seems to be very heavily scorched.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13809c
string.body: Dark Red Blood;A mysterious blood stain that can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_c]. It has been charred by the flames.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_13810a
string.body: Stone Tablet[pl:"Tablets"] of the Rune Tribe;A relic of the Rune Tribe that can be obtained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5_Fortress_Statue_Rune_65_An]. It contains records concerning historic events.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_13812a
string.body: Order Letter;A confidential document that can be obtained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_A3_TR_Fi_65_An_Q]. It was probably written by the Beritra Army leadership.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23800a
string.body: Haldor's Letter[pl:"Letters"];A letter from Haldor, addressed to the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_OP1_ZoneTeleport_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23806a
string.body: Damaged Generator[pl:"Generators"];A Beritra Army generator that you can obtain from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine]. It seems to be damaged and no longer usable. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Muderungrung_E] would like to have it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23807a
string.body: Ember Sample[pl:"Samples"];Can be obtained by eliminating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_C1_ElementalFire3_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23809a
string.body: Burnt Bark[pl:"Barks"];A mysterious piece of bark found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_a]. It seems to be very heavily burnt.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23809b
string.body: Scorched Bark[pl:"Barks"];A mysterious piece of bark found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_b]. It seems to be very heavily scorched.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23809c
string.body: Dark Red Blood Stain[pl:"Stains"];A mysterious blood stain that can be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_c]. It has been charred by the flames.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_23810a
string.body: Writing Tablet[pl:"Tablets"] of the Rune Tribe;A relic of the Rune Tribe that can be obtained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5_Fortress_Statue_Rune_65_An]. It contains notes concerning the historic events of the Rune Tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_23812a
string.body: Command Letter;A confidential document that can be obtained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_A3_TR_Wi_65_An_Q]. It was probably written by the Beritra Army leadership.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_10100a
string.body: Kahrun's Drawing[pl:"Drawings"];A drawing by Kahrun that depicts a mysterious device.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_20100a
string.body: Kahrun's Sketch[pl:"Sketches"];A drawing by Kahrun that depicts a mysterious device.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10100b
string.body: Small Id Identification Device[pl:"Devices"];A device received from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Hyunmurung_E]. This disposable device lets you find rich Id deposits in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20100b
string.body: Small Id Sensor[pl:"Sensors"];A sensor received from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Muderungrung_E]. This disposable device lets you find rich Id deposits in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10101a
string.body: Invasion Plan[pl:"Plans"];A confidential document that can be obtained after eliminating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_Noble_L_QNmd_65_An]. This must be the Beritra Army's invasion plan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20101a
string.body: Invasion Command[pl:"Command"];A confidential document that can be obtained after eliminating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_Noble_D_QNmd_65_An]. This must be the Beritra Army's invasion plan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_14201a
string.body: Calydon Tribe Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"];It contains [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_CalydonMageNamed_50_Q_An]'s records about the Calydon and the Petralith.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14110a
string.body: Revolutionary Symbol[pl:"Symbols"];A symbol worn by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14113a
string.body: Sacred Image[pl:"Images"] of Kaisinel;A blessed gift for participants in the great pilgrimage. You receive this by eliminating the Krall watching the streets from the holy [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA23].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14120a
string.body: Clean Kerubian Bucket[pl:"Buckets"];A bucket filled in the swamp with the pure waters of Dimaia Fountainfall.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14121a
string.body: Revolutionary Symbol[pl:"Symbols"];A symbol worn by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24113a
string.body: Tiamat's Sword;A sword dropped by the Balaur Brigade General during the Millennium War. It was once owned by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_24122a
string.body: Pagimkin's Report;You receive this by investigating the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_DF2_Book_Q24122] near Pagimkin's Corpse in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D5_ID].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24121a
string.body: Sealed Holy Goblet[pl:"Goblets"];[%dic:STR_DIC_M_TreasureGuardianQ_36_Ae] has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24114a
string.body: Umkata's Bones;They can bring Umkata to life. [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWarriorS_18_Ae] or [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanHunterS_17_An] have these on them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24114b
string.body: Umkata's Earrings;They can wake up Umkata. It is said that they were placed within [%dic:STR_DIC_E_20] and hidden in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_25].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24114c
string.body: Umkata's Weapon;It can bring Umkata to life. According to rumour, it was stolen from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental1stD_18_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental2ndD_18_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16940a
string.body: Abyss Research Journal[pl:"Journals"];A research journal on the new Abyss technology compiled by the Balaur researchers in Baruna Research Laboratory. The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLDF4_Re_01_DrakanMage_Wi_65_An] has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26940a
string.body: Abyss Research Data;A research journal on the new Abyss technology compiled by the Balaur researchers in Baruna Research Laboratory. The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLDF4_Re_01_DrakanMage_Wi_65_An] has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_24111a
string.body: Lepharist Primer[pl:"Primers"];A secret document belonging to the Lepharist Revolutionaries. Investigate the 'suspicious document' that can be found in a house near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_5_1] in order to get hold of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13708a
string.body: Alarm Bomb[pl:"Bombs"];Uses explosions to sound an alarm when Asmodians are approaching. It should be installed near the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_DF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13400a
string.body: Infiltration Detector[pl:"Detectors"];Analyses and identifies the phenomena that appear shortly before the Beritra Army infiltration. It should be used on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13400].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13401a
string.body: Infiltration Sensor[pl:"Sensors"];Analyses and identifies the phenomena that appear shortly before the Beritra Army infiltration. It should be used on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13401].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13402a
string.body: Maintained Target Circuit[pl:"Circuits"];A circuit in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_L_1]. It is in relatively good condition, so you can probably analyse the Beritra Army records contained within.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13402b
string.body: Intact Target Circuit[pl:"Circuits"];A circuit in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_L_2]. It is in relatively good condition, so you can probably analyse the Beritra Army records contained within.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23400a
string.body: Invasion Detector[pl:"Detectors"];Analyses and identifies the phenomena that appear shortly before the Beritra Army invasion. It should be used on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13400].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23401a
string.body: Invasion Sensor[pl:"Sensors"];Analyses and identifies the phenomena that appear shortly before the Beritra Army invasion. It should be used on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13401].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23402a
string.body: Serviced Target Circuit[pl:"Circuits"];A circuit in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_D_1]. It is in relatively good condition, so you can probably analyse the Beritra Army records contained within.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23402b
string.body: Functioning Target Circuit[pl:"Circuits"];A circuit in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_D_2]. It is in relatively good condition, so you can probably analyse the Beritra Army records contained within.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13903a
string.body: Report[pl:"Reports"] on the Conquest of Akaron;You obtain this report by combining the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_01], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_02], the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_03] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_04].

string.body: Report[pl:"Reports"] on the Conquest of North Akaron;Can be obtained after defeating the legates of the three bases in North Akaron. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Elger_E] writes this.

string.body: Invader's Black Orb[pl:"Orbs"];Can be obtained by defeating the Elite Kumon (level 2 or 3) or the Elite Tumon (level 2 or 3) that appear during Beritra's big invasion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13916a

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Item_ldf5_f_all_title02
string.body: Victor of Kaldor;You can receive this title as a reward for the victory in siege warfare for the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011] in Kaldor. You can accept certain quests when you bear this title.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13813a
string.body: Hot Ash;Can be looted from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_B1_B2_B3_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23813a
string.body: Flaming Ash;Can be looted from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_B1_B2_B3_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13815a
string.body: Anoha's Sword Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];A sword fragment received from the Brigade General of a legion for the victory in siege warfare for the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011] in Kaldor. You can receive quests if you have it on you. It disappears after 6 days and 12 hours.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Key_ldf5_fortress_raid_01a
string.body: Anoha's Runeseal Stone[pl:"Stones"];A gemstone received from the Brigade General of a legion for the victory in siege warfare for the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress_7011] in Kaldor. It seems to be a key that lets you lift the seal on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Named_Spawn_FOBJ]. It disappears after 6 days and 12 hours.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13819a
string.body: Hot Soot;You obtain this special soot by defeating the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_B1_B2_C1_C2_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23819a
string.body: Flaming Soot;You obtain this special soot by defeating the[%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_B1_B2_C1_C2_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_key_ldf4_advance_named_key01a
string.body: Relic[pl:"Relics"] of the Ancestors;An accessory of the Popoku and the Chapir used with the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF4_Advance_stone_all]. The Stubborn Chapir healers and recruits as well as the Cruel Popoku healers and recruits near the base have it on them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24231a
string.body: Grave Robber Band's Old Sword[pl:"Swords"];A weapon from the equipment stolen by the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparAsD_14_An] from the residents of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_19].

string.body: Agrint Shell[pl:"Shells"];An item that can be obtained by eliminating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_FakeTree_65_An].

string.body: Dionae Root[pl:"Roots"];An item that can be obtained by eliminating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_Dionaea_65_An].

string.body: Frillneck Fang[pl:"Fangs"];An item that can be obtained by eliminating [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4_Advance_FrillFaimam_65_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13704a
string.body: Alarm Ribbon[pl:"Ribbons"];Analyses and signals the phenomena that appear when Asmodians are approaching. It should be installed near the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_AB].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13706a
string.body: Infiltration Report[pl:"Reports"];A report from the scout troop that has infiltrated [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23704a
string.body: Surveillance Ribbon[pl:"Ribbons"];Analyses and signals the phenomena that appear when Elyos are approaching. It should be installed near the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_AB].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23706a
string.body: Infiltration Order[pl:"Orders"];An order for the mission to infiltrate the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5_Fortress] region.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23708a
string.body: Surveillance Bomb[pl:"Bombs"];Uses explosions to sound an alarm when Elyos are approaching. It should be installed near the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_LF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Event_svs_crystal
string.body: [Event] Token[pl:"Tokens"] of Honour;This is required to open the corridor that leads to a new Abyss. You can receive this in the instances where the event takes place.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Junk_soul_r01_65a
string.body: Flawless Ancient Manastone Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Can be obtained from some monsters in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Junk_humanoid_r01_65a
string.body: Rune Tribe's Flawless Claw[pl:"Claws"] Accessory Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];Can be obtained from some monsters in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Junk_animal_r01_65a
string.body: Monster's Flawless Claw[pl:"Claws"];Can be obtained from some monsters in North Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_V15_N_ch_shopmaterial_C_61a
string.body: Idium Chain[pl:"Chains"];This item is sold by a merchant that appears after the conquest of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D1_v15]. Only a limited number of these can be sold per person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_V13_N_po_shopmaterial_C_61a
string.body: Idela Elemental Water;This item is sold by a merchant that appears after the conquest of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF5b_D2_v13]. Only a limited number of these can be sold per person.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Event_svs_Junk_all
string.body: Corridor Materials;Materials that are needed to open a Portal. These include [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_Event_svs_crystal], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_Junk_soul_r01_65a], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_Junk_humanoid_r01_65a] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_Junk_animal_r01_65a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_80615a
string.body: Coupon[pl:"Coupons"];This item can be exchanged for [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_I_world_cash_ingame_gacha_coin]. Look for the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_GACHA] in the capital cities.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_cash_ingame_gacha_coin
string.body: Shugo Game Token;A token that lets you play the Shugo Game.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_world_event_webshop_03a
string.body: Tasty Chocolate;A chocolate bar that children love. Available free from: [%shoplink].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_returnbox_b_01
string.body: Shining Chest[pl:"Chests"] of the Returnees;Can be looted from Vasharti in the Rentus Base, Tahabata in Tiamat's Fortress, Tiamat in Tiamat's Hideout, the Artillery at Jormungand's Bridge, Tagnu in the Refuge of the Rune Tribe, Dynatum in the Rune Shield Tower as well as from Archradim and Sita in the Sauro War Depot.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_returnbox_s_01
string.body: Chest[pl:"Chests"] of the Returnees;Can be looted from Bakarma in Draupnir Cave, Unstable Triroan in Theobomos Lab, Lannok in the Adma Stronghold, Anuhart in Dark Poeta, Debilkarim in Udas Temple, Anurati in the abandoned Udas Temple and Rudra in Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_key_returnbox_b_01
string.body: Returnees' Noble Box Key;If you complete quests for the Refuge of Returnees, you can receive this key as a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_key_returnbox_s_01
string.body: Returnees' Box Key;If you complete quests for the Refuge of Returnees, you can receive this key as a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_scroll_return_arena_clobby
string.body: Returning Stone of Refuge;A stone that grants you access to the Refuge of Returnees. Use it if you are far away from the refuge and want to return to it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13820a
string.body: Burnt Ash;Can be looted from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_C1_C2_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13821a
string.body: Reddish Ash;Can be looted from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_D1_D2_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23820a
string.body: Cold Ash;Can be looted from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_C1_C2_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23821a
string.body: Red Ash;Can be looted from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_D1_D2_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_wrap_return_alldaeva_first
string.body: Patrol's Blessing Box;A chest for returnees. Characters up to level 55 will receive a Daevanion Patrol Set. Characters at level 56 and over will receive a Daevanion Elite Patrol Set.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11152a
string.body: White Root[pl:"Roots"];A root that you can obtain from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_Agrint_Drana_54_An]. It exudes a repellent fragrance but is effective against back pain.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20502a
string.body: Highland Leather;Leather of highland creatures. It can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_FrillFaimam_Mother_57_An] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_FrillFaimam_Baby_57_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20502b
string.body: Token of Friendship;An insignia of the Aquans denoting that you are trustworthy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20503a
string.body: Token of Unity;A token worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_D_MissionTiamat_Fi_60_An]. It is a key and can control the Aetheric Field Stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10501a
string.body: Map[pl:"Maps"] of Ruins;A map that Mosphera found by the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01]. It shows a mysterious region.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10501b
string.body: Balaur Insignia;A Balaur Insignia worn by all [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_Q_B_TrDrZombID_Wi_57_An] on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_B_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10502a
string.body: Earth Sample[pl:"Samples"];Can be taken from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Soil_Creep_Q10502a] at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10502c
string.body: Wall Relief Rubbing[pl:"Rubbings"];A copy of the peculiar wall relief found in the Black Fins Village at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_C_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_10503a
string.body: Old Balaur Document[pl:"Documents"];You receive it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Old_Papyrus_Q10503a], which you can find in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_D_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10504a
string.body: Pepper Bomb[pl:"Bombs"];A bomb containing pepper, hurled with devastating effect. Try it out on [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_Q_E_Vri_HPDrainDD_Fi_NM_62_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10504b
string.body: Tablet Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];You obtain it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Broken_Slate_Q10504a] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF5_SZ_E_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10505b
string.body: Page 2;A page from Beritra's secret document that Erinos scattered about. You can take it from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_Q_F_Vri_HPDrainDD_Fi_NM_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10505c
string.body: Page 3;A page from Beritra's secret document that Erinos scattered about. You can obtain it by examining the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Ripped_Plan_Q10505a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10505d
string.body: Page 4;A page from Beritra's secret document that Erinos scattered about. You can take it from the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_Q_F_Vri_Strike_Wi_63_An] or the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_Q_F_Vri_Heal_Pr_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30721a
string.body: Sedative;The potion of a Reian sorcerer. You can use it in the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF5_IDTiamat_invisible_Teleport_1]. It counteracts dizziness.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_30771a
string.body: Invigorant;The potion of a Reian sorcerer, which can be used in the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_IDTiamat_invisible_Teleport_1]. It counteracts dizziness.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25001a
string.body: Red Pearl[pl:"Pearls"];A rare-coloured pearl to be found on the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF5_SZ_A_01]. You can obtain it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_pearlshell_Q25001].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25012a
string.body: Vespines Scale[pl:"Scales"];Scales that can be taken from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_B_Vespa_Fish_56_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25012b
string.body: Korarico Scale[pl:"Scales"];Scales that can be taken from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_B_Trico_56_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_B_Trico_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25013a
string.body: Algae Sample[pl:"Samples"];A piece of dried [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_seagrass_Q25013].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25020a
string.body: Aquan Weapon[pl:"Weapons"];Weapons borne by the Aquans. You can obtain them from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_QuestMerman_Fi_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_QuestMerman_As_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_QuestMerman_Wi_58_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_QuestMerman_Pr_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25020b
string.body: Sign of Faith;An Aquan insignia. You can take it from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_QuestMerman_Wi_58_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_QuestMerman_Pr_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25022a
string.body: Fugus Meat;It can be obtained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_Beholder_57_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_Beholder_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25022b
string.body: Fungie Meat;The meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_Fungy_57_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25022c
string.body: Seafood Soup[pl:"Soups"];A soup cooked according to a Reian recipe.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25023a
string.body: Malodor Seed[pl:"Seeds"];Seed gathered from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_C_Rafflesia_57_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25023b
string.body: Improved Seed[pl:"Seeds"];This seed was created by improving the seed of the Highland Malodor.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25030a
string.body: Drakan Possessions;Items that can be taken from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_D_MissionTiamat_Fi_60_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25030b
string.body: Drakan Possessions;Items that can be taken from the undead Drakan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25031b
string.body: Memento;A memento found on the Aquan spirit [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_D_QuestMerman_Ghost_58_An]. It seems to have belonged to the Asmodians. The name "Muel" is engraved on it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25033a
string.body: Karabi Meat;Meat that can be obtained from [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_D_Neuth1_58_An], [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_D_NeutFly_58_n] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_D_Neuth2_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25050a
string.body: Moonbeam Wings;The wings of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_E1_Spakleworm_D_59_n]. They are used in the Aquan ritual.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25050b
string.body: Sea Giant Jewellery;Jewellery worn by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_E1_Nepilim_Sea_59_An]. It is used in the Aquan ritual.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25050c
string.body: Moonbeam Seeds;Seeds of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_E1_Rafflesia_59_An]. They are required for the Aquan ritual.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25050d
string.body: Ritual Offering[pl:"Offerings"];Offering for the Aquan ritual, crafted from special materials.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25051a
string.body: King's Treasure Map[pl:"Maps"];A map showing the location of the King's treasure.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25052a
string.body: Sea Giant Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A crystal that is highly sought after by the sea giants. You can obtain it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_giantcrystal_Q25052].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25062a
string.body: Blue Crystal Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];A crystal fragment that gleams with a blue light. A mysterious energy can be felt. You can take it from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_F_Comad_60_An] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_F_ElementalWater1_61_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25070a
string.body: Blue Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A blue crystal that emanates a cold energy. A mysterious power can be felt. You can obtain it from a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF5_FOBJ_icecrystal_Q25070].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25073a
string.body: Melchor Poison;A strong poison obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_G_QuestScorpion_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25073b
string.body: Concentrated Poison[pl:"Poisons"];An extremely strong concentrated poison made from the poison of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_G_QuestScorpion_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25080a
string.body: Ember Rock[pl:"Rocks"];A piece of rock that is extremely hot.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25082a
string.body: Kirrin Meat;Piece of meat from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_H_kuillus_62_An], used to bait a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_H2_QuestShellizard_63_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25084a
string.body: Desert Lobnite Meat;The meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_H_Lobnite_Crab_62_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25085a
string.body: Id Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];Id crystals teleported by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_H1_QuestVritra_Transport_Ri_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25081a
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Red Jellyfish;An essence extracted from red jellyfish.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25081b
string.body: Essence[pl:"Essences"] of Jellyfish;A special essence of the red jellyfish, selected for its rare properties.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25091a
string.body: Dimension Gate Controls;The key to the tower held by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_J_QuestVritra_Kn_64_Ae] of the Beritra Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25092a
string.body: Monitor Heart[pl:"Hearts"];The burning heart of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_J_Varanus_64_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25094a
string.body: Balaur Bones;Balaur bones, still warm.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25094b
string.body: Tribute Chest[pl:"Chests"];A chest that the Balaur intended to use to negotiate a truce with the Aquans of Charlirunerk's Daemons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_35053a
string.body: Energy Shell[pl:"Shells"];A shell containing a mysterious energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_35054a
string.body: Desert Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A crystal occasionally found in deserts. It tastes salty and emanates a peculiar energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_36529a

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_4
string.body: Big White Snowball[pl:"Snowballs"];This snowball is what you get when you refine [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_1] three times. It hurts to be struck by one of those.

string.body: Magnificent White Snowball[pl:"Snowballs"];This snowball is what you get when you refine [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_1] four times. It scarcely resembles a snowball now.

string.name: STR_DIC_event_2014xmas_snow_10
string.body: Legendary White Snowball[pl:"Snowballs"];A legendary [%dic:STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_1] which has been refined five times. It is known only from legend.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13403a
string.body: Infiltration Detector[pl:"Detectors"];Analyses and signals the phenomena that appear shortly before the Beritra Army infiltration. It should be used on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LF1a_invisible_Q13403a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13403b
string.body: Infiltration Sensor[pl:"Sensors"];Identifies and analyses the signs that appear shortly before the Balaur Army infiltration. It should be used on [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LF1a_invisible_Q13403b].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13403c
string.body: Functioning Target Circuit[pl:"Circuits"];A circuit of the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Vritramachine_L_1]. It is well-preserved, which means it can probably be used to analyse the records of the Balaur Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13403d

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23403a
string.body: Invasion Detector[pl:"Detectors"];Analyses and signals the phenomena that appear shortly before the Beritra Army invasion. It should be used at the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_DF1a_invisible_Q23403a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23403b
string.body: Invasion Sensor[pl:"Sensors"];Analyses and identifies the phenomena that appear shortly before the Beritra Army invasion. It should be used at the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_DF1a_invisible_Q23403b].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23403c
string.body: Serviced Target Circuit[pl:"Circuits"];A circuit in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF1a_FOBJ_Vritramachine_D_1]. It is in relatively good condition, so you can probably use it to analyse the Beritra Army records.

string.body: Hare Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];The insignia of the Redeye Hare Legion. You can obtain it in dungeons or when defeating the [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_Event_Chuseok_Rabbit_75_Live].

string.body: Lodas's Greater Gold Star[pl:"Stars"];A large catalyst used by the [%dic:STR_DIC_EVENT_Q50052] for his alchemy. Is more powerful than the normal Gold Star.

string.name: STR_DIC_cash_item_absoluteexp_recovery_big
string.body: Nabaru's Greater Golden Apple[pl:"Apples"];A large catalyst used by the [%dic:STR_DIC_EVENT_Q50052] for his alchemy. Is more powerful than the normal Golden Apple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_fifth_charm_01
string.body: Normal Talisman[pl:"Talismans"] of Misfortune;Seals [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_fifth_monster01] so that it can be destroyed in one fell swoop.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_fifth_charm_02
string.body: Greater Talisman[pl:"Talismans"] of Misfortune;Seals [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_fifth_monster02] so that it can be destroyed in one fell swoop.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_fifth_scentbag_01
string.body: Sealed Bundle[pl:"Bundles"] of Incense;A bundle of incense in which [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_fifth_monster01] is ensnared. Bring it to the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_world_event_fifth_tree] to receive a special reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_fifth_scentbag_02
string.body: Sealed Greater Bundle[pl:"Bundles"] of Incense;A bundle of incense in which [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_fifth_monster02] is ensnared. Bring it to the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_world_event_fifth_tree] to receive a special reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_IDEternity_War_WP
string.body: Battlefield Point[pl:"Points"];Daevas receive these points as a reward for great achievements on the battlefield. You can exchange them for useful items from the Battlefield Quartermaster. They disappear as soon as you leave the battlefield.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_IDEternity_War_Nectar
string.body: Dew of Life;The [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDEternity_War_ShugoSeller] sells this item which you can use to restore the lost power of the faery Elb in the canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13968a
string.body: Artefact Core Fragment[pl:"Fragments"] of Knowledge;This core fragment was lost during the Cataclysm in the Museum of Knowledge and appears to have ended up in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13978a
string.body: Artefact Core Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];An artefact core fragment that was discovered in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War] and is believed to be responsible for the strange changes in the canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10010a
string.body: Broken Patrol Armour;Broken armour belonging to the Freedom Arrow, which was sent to Narakkalli on a reconnaissance mission. You obtain it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_FOBJ_Broken_Armor_Q10010a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10010b
string.body: Broken Patrol Weapon;A broken weapon belonging to the Freedom Arrow, which was sent to Narakkalli on a reconnaissance mission. You obtain it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_FOBJ_Melted_Arm_Q10010a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10010c
string.body: Blood-Spattered Epaulette[pl:"Epaulettes"];An epaulette belonging to the Freedom Arrow Patrol, which was sent to Narakkalli on a reconnaissance mission. You obtain it from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_1round_Drakan_Fi_All].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10010d
string.body: Broken Wings;Daeva wings which probably belonged to a member of the Freedom Arrow Patrol which explored Narakkalli. You obtain them from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_1round_Drakan_High_Fi_All], a[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_1round_Drakan_High_As_All], or a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_1round_Drakan_High_Ra_All].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20010a
string.body: Broken Patrol Armour;Broken armour belonging to the Annihilation Arrow, which was sent to Narakkalli on a reconnaissance mission. You obtain it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_FOBJ_Broken_Armor_Q10010a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20010b
string.body: Broken Patrol Weapon;A broken weapon belonging to the Annihilation Arrow, which was sent to Narakkalli on a reconnaissance mission. You obtain it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_FOBJ_Melted_Arm_Q10010a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20010c
string.body: Bloody Epaulette[pl:"Epaulettes"];An epaulette belonging to the Annihilation Arrow Patrol, which was sent to Narakkalli on a reconnaissance mission. You obtain it from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_1round_Drakan_Fi_All].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20010d
string.body: Snapped Wings;Daeva wings which probably belonged to a member of the Annihilation Arrow Patrol which explored Narakkalli. You obtain them from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_1round_Drakan_High_Fi_All], a[%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_1round_Drakan_High_As_All], or a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Ere_1round_Drakan_High_Ra_All].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16838a
string.body: Abyss Report[pl:"Reports"];A book containing information about the Abyss. It is reported that many of the findings contained therein were previously kept secret.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26838a
string.body: History of the Legendary Sorcerer;A book which tells the story of the legendary sorcerer. This story had only ever been transmitted orally in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_15680a
string.body: Urughal Branch[pl:"Branches"];A branch which you can get by killing an Urughal. You can use it to resurrect an Urughal.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_15680b
string.body: Shuket's Empty Bottle;An empty bottle which Shuket gave you in order to obtain the Dew of Life required to resurrect an Urughal.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25680a
string.body: Gerkan's Empty Bottle;An empty bottle which you require in order to obtain the Plains Essence for Gerkan's magic elixir.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Item_Newbie_Start_Coin_L
string.body: Symbol[pl:"Symbols"] of Growth (30 days);A symbol for new and returning Daevas. You can take on Ascension Assistant Quests when you are in possession of this symbol.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Coin_Grow_Common_Coin
string.body: Coin[pl:"Coins"] of Growth;A coin for new and returning Daevas. Is issued automatically at login if you have a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Item_Newbie_Start_Coin_L] with you.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Item_Newbie_Vip_Start_Coin_L
string.body: Dazzling Symbol[pl:"Symbols"] of Growth (60 days);A symbol for premium Daevas. You can take on the Premium Ascension Assistant Quest when you are in possession of this symbol.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Coin_Grow_Premium_Coin
string.body: Dazzling Coin[pl:"Coins"] of Growth;A coin for premium Daevas. Is issued automatically at login if you have a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Item_Newbie_Vip_Start_Coin_L] with you.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Matter_Enchant_Exceed_01
string.body: Almighty Enchantment Stone[pl:"Stones"];Can increase the basic attributes of weapons, armour or a number of wings when used on equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Matter_2stenchant_m_65
string.body: Holy Upgrade Serum[pl:"Serums"];Boosts the value of the Lord's accessories and feathers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_15545a
string.body: Lesser Minion Contract;A contract for a minion. Enables you to own a summoned minion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25545a
string.body: Lesser Minion Contract;A contract for a minion. Enables you to own a summoned minion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_MINION_EVOLUTIONSTONE_01
string.body: Minionite;A material for upgrading minions. Can be used for minions that have advanced to a sufficient level.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9716a
string.body: Chocolate Ginseng Syrup[pl:"Syrups"];A viscous solution that smells like chocolate and can be obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_Dark_Choco_Saam_A] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9716b
string.body: Chocolate Ginseng Fine Root[pl:"Roots"];A root that smells like chocolate and can be obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF6_White_Choco_Saam_A] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9717a
string.body: Chocolate Ginseng Concentrate[pl:"Concentrates"];A viscous Chocolate Ginseng that smells like chocolate and can be obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF6_Dark_Choco_Saam_A] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9717b
string.body: Chocolate Ginseng Dry Root[pl:"Roots"];A root that smells like chocolate and can be obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF6_White_Choco_Saam_A] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF6].

string.name: STR_DIC_coin_cash_idevent_s3
string.body: Poppy Letter[pl:"Letters"];A Poppy's letter describing the plan for cleaning up the Kumuki Hideout.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_event_2017devaranger_component
string.body: Ranger Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];An insignia issued by Shugo Rangers. You receive it automatically when you log in during the event.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_event_2017devaranger_medal
string.body: Ranger Medal[pl:"Medals"];A medal issued by Shugo Rangers. You receive it automatically as a quest reward during the event.

string.name: STR_DIC_cash_scroll_init_coolt_IDSweep_02
string.body: Entry Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"] for Trillonerk's Secret Gold Vault;A mysterious scroll that grants access to Trillonerk's Gold Vault, which is concealed by an enchantment.

string.name: STR_DIC_DOC_QUEST_80961a
string.body: Fire Temple Combat Simulator[pl:"Simulators"];Grants you a quest and the Destroyer Aerolink.

string.name: STR_DIC_world_test_padet_change_01
string.body: Destroyer Aerolink[pl:"Aerolinks"];A facility used to access the incredible megaweapon known as the Destroyer. Can only be used in the Fire Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_cash_idevent_s4_gold
string.body: Shimmering Gold Ingot[pl:"Ingots"];A gold ingot that shimmers alluringly. Exchange it for something of equal value with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LC1_event_npc_idsolo_s4].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_cash_scroll_init_coolt_idevent_01
string.body: Entry Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"] for the Kumuki Hideout;A magical scroll which allows you to re-enter the Kumuki Hideout.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_cash_scroll_init_coolt_IDSweep_02b
string.body: Special Entry Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"] for Trillonerk's Secret Gold Vault;A mysterious scroll that grants access to Trillonerk's Gold Vault, which is concealed by an enchantment.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10110a
string.body: Burning Black Sulphur;Burning Black Sulphur which is giving off toxic fumes. It can be obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Sulphur_Q10110a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10110b
string.body: Burning Heart[pl:"Hearts"];The heart of a creature created from Fregion's Flames. It can be obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Fre_Monster_01_Q10110].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10110c
string.body: Glowing Lava;Lava which flows from a tree on the scorched earth. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Lava_Q10110a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10110d
string.body: Cleaving Flame[pl:"Flames"];The flames of a creature created from Fregion's Flames. It can be obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Fre_Monster_02_Q10110].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10112a
string.body: Elyos First Aid Kit[pl:"Kits"];Contains medicine and materials for dressing wounds. You can use it to help the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ab1_Hurt_LGuard_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20112a
string.body: Asmodian First Aid Kit[pl:"Kits"];Contains medicine and materials for dressing wounds. You can use it to help the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ab1_Hurt_DGuard_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10112b
string.body: Elyos Supply Box[pl:"Boxes"];Contains supplies for Elyos. It can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Ab1_FOBJ_Supply_Box_Q10112a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20112b
string.body: Asmodian Supply Box[pl:"Boxes"];Contains supplies for Asmodians. It can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Ab1_FOBJ_Supply_Box_Q10112a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_World_event_halloween_Candybomb
string.body: Candy Bomb[pl:"Bombs"];A powerful bomb that looks like a piece of candy. Made by the Milky Way League. Can deal heavy damage to the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_World_event_halloween_JOL_party].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80975a
string.body: Magic pumpkin[pl:"pumpkins"];An ingredient used in Esta's magic pumpkin stew. You can loot it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_World_event_halloween_JOL_party].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_cash_scroll_init_coolt_idevent_def
string.body: Entry Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"] for the Hell Pass;A magical scroll which allows you to re-enter the Hell Pass.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_cash_scroll_init_coolt_idevent_def_master
string.body: Special Entry Scroll[pl:"Scrolls"] for the Hell Pass;A magical scroll which allows you to re-enter the Hell Pass.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_50102_all
string.body: Dragon Lord Article[pl:"Articles"];Horns, wings, claws, hearts and tails of the Dragon Lords, which the Shugo merchant Burrinerk buys.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_50103_all
string.body: Special Dragon Lord Article[pl:"Articles"];Special horns, wings, claws, hearts and tails of the Dragon Lords, which the Shugo merchant Burrinerk buys.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_IDETERNITY_WAR_01
string.body: Battlefield Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];This insignia is awarded to recognise outstanding achievements in the Neviwind Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_avatarserver_welcome_coin
string.body: Illusion Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];An insignia which assists Daevas with their Ascension.

string.name: STR_DIC_cash_key_IDSweep_02
string.body: Madorinerk's Treasure Chest Key[pl:"Keys"];This key opens Madorinerk's Treasure Chest in Trillonerk's Secret Gold Vault.

string.name: STR_DIC_coin_cash_idevent_s6
string.body: Milky Way Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];A treasure used by the Milky Way League. Liberate Poppy from the Kumuki Hideout to obtain him.

string.name: STR_DIC_event_2017hallo_Candybomb
string.body: Candy Bomb[pl:"Bombs"];A powerful bomb that looks like a piece of candy. Made by the Milky Way League. Can deal enormous damage to a Pumpkin Monster.

string.name: STR_DIC_event_2017hallo_quest_component
string.body: Ripe Pumpkin[pl:"Pumpkins"];An ingredient for Esta's Magic Stew. You can obtain it from a Pumpkin Monster.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Doc_quest_60206a
string.body: Translated Kunpapa Document[pl:"Documents"];Contains the Balaur's Invasion Plan for the Dimension Gate. Complete the campaign "Deciphering the Kunpapa Documents" to obtain it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_60006a
string.body: Thick Flute[pl:"Flutes"] of Elim;A piece of the Daminu Flute, which broke in twain.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_60006b
string.body: Thin Flute[pl:"Flutes"] of Elim;A piece of the Daminu Flute, which broke in twain.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_60006c
string.body: Daminu Flute[pl:"Flutes"];A flute made from Daminu's branch. Play the flute to visit Forest Protector Daminu.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_60007a
string.body: Kobold Axe[pl:"Axes"];An axe used by the Dukaki Kobolds.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_60007b
string.body: Axe Bundle[pl:"Bundles"];An axe bundle belonging to a Tursin Big Boss.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_60204a
string.body: Kunpapa Document[pl:"Documents"];The document was written in the language of the Balaur. It appears to discuss matters of critical importance.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61101a
string.body: Refined Odium;Odium that has been refined after it was mined.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61101b
string.body: Raw Odium;Unrefined Odium ore that was just mined.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61607a
string.body: Crystal[pl:"Crystals"] of the Poisoned Elim;This crystal can be obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_36_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Agrint_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61609a
string.body: Transparent Discus[pl:"Discuses"];Kill the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DeathKnight_45_Ae] to obtain it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61613a
string.body: Myanee's Flute[pl:"Flutes"];A wooden tube with five holes. Myanee took it with her wherever she went.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61614a
string.body: Broken Odium Piece[pl:"Pieces"];The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KrallFighterMad_42_Ae], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KrallAssassinMad_42_Ae], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KrallRangerMad_40_Ae], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KrallRangerMad_42_Ae], the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_F_KrallFighterMad_41_Ae] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_F_KrallRangerMad_40_Ae] have it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61618a
string.body: Tipolid Sleep Trap[pl:"Traps"];This special trap causes Tipolids to fall into a deep slumber.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61618b
string.body: Tipolid Paralysis Trap[pl:"Traps"];This special trap paralyses Tipolids temporarily.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Doc_Quest_61918a
string.body: Anurakti's Directive[pl:"Directives"];It is owned by the Dragonbound in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B6]. Getting to it is no easy feat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61905a
string.body: Rynoce Epidermis[pl:"Epidermises"];Kill the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Rhinoce_Horn_53_An] to obtain it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61905b
string.body: Rockyback Rynoce Epidermis[pl:"Epidermises"];Kill the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Rhinoce_Stone_53_n] to obtain it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61916a
string.body: Blue Klaw Egg[pl:"Eggs"];[%dic:STR_DIC_N_Rollia] gave it to you. Looks like something's going to hatch soon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_61916b
string.body: Red Klaw Egg[pl:"Eggs"];[%dic:STR_DIC_N_Rollia] gave it to you. Looks like something's going to hatch soon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62200a
string.body: Aether Generator Repair Tool[pl:"Tools"];You can repair the Aether Generator with this tool. Use it near the machine.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_62204a
string.body: Map[pl:"Maps"] to Explore the Ruins;A hand-drawn map. The location of a mysterious ruin has been marked in red.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62206a
string.body: Coral Horn Sample[pl:"Samples"];The corals from the head of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_B_Trico_56_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62207a
string.body: Coral Ridge Sample[pl:"Samples"];The corals from the back of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_B_RottentreeS_56_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62221a
string.body: Tightly Bound Load[pl:"Loads"];A load that has been tightly bound for transport. It needs to be loaded onto an idle Brax.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_62223a
string.body: Drana Seed[pl:"Seeds"];Drana Seeds that you can obtain from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF5_FOBJ_Wild_Drana_Q15044a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_62225a
string.body: Powdered Brohum Feed[pl:"Feed"];A powder used to feed [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_D_Brohum_M_Forest_58_An] and [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_D_Brohum_M_Young_Forest_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_62226a
string.body: Ploughtail[pl:"Ploughtails"];Hunt a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_D_Lobster_58_n] to obtain it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62232a
string.body: Incredible Treasure List[pl:"Lists"];Dodorunerk's treasure list, which was stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF5_E_Cellatu_59_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62238a

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Event_coin_2018newyear_01

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Lugbug_JUNK_LUGBUG_REQUEST_01
string.body: Leibo Soul[pl:"Souls"];You found out that Lugbug is looking for companions and has sold a box containing Leibo Traces in the Gold Sand Shop. Gather Leibo Traces and attempt a substance transformation to craft a Leibo Soul.

string.body: Love Coin[pl:"Coins"];A coin that Stellaki threw into the fountain on [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stellaky_Love_Island] while praying for eternal love for her boyfriend.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62904a
string.body: Meromas' Book[pl:"Books"];It is quite likely that you can capture it from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF8_B_D3_Legas].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62905b
string.body: Kitter Grass[pl:"Grasses"];Kitters like the smell of this grass. You can get it from the zoologist at the Volcanic Ash Research Centre.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62906a
string.body: Ecological Test Specimen[pl:"Specimens"];The [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Stella_Inspector] from the Stella Corporation in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_B3_Lega], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_H], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_D_IDLDF8], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_I] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K3] regions use these specimens for environmental research in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_assembly_quest_62913f
string.body: Stella Problem-solving Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];You can craft it by putting together five of the fragments you received for completing the problem-solving quests from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_OP_Inanna_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Shulack_Stellaky_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Meromas_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_IlRina_E] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Apeiron_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_light_shop_material_gather_ldf7_80a
string.body: Great Vitality Extractor[pl:"Extractors"];Available from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF6_op_highcraft_material_Seller], Lakrum's merchant for magical crafting items.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_dark_shop_material_gather_ldf7_80a
string.body: Great Vitality Extractor[pl:"Extractors"];Available from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF6_op_highcraft_material_Seller], Lakrum's merchant for magical crafting items.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_LUGBUG_POTION_SHIELD_ALL_01
string.body: Leibo Protection;An item that reflects a certain amount of damage away from you thanks to Leibo power. Available in the Gold Sand Shop.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_60606a
string.body: Sound Cube;Bears the inscription 'From Inanna', which makes it pretty obvious to guess who the voice recorded on this object belongs to.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_70606a
string.body: Sound Box;Bears the inscription 'From Inanna', which makes it pretty easy to guess who the voice recorded on this object belongs to.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_60606b
string.body: Engine Room Control Key;The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Drakan_Gaurd_80_An] keeps it safe. The key opens the door to the prison door in the Engine Room, where [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission04_Venirung01_E] is being held captive.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_70606b
string.body: Engine Room Master Key;The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Drakan_Gaurd_80_An] keeps it safe. The key opens the door to the prison door in the Engine Room, where [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission04_Venirung01_E] is being held captive.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_60607a
string.body: Master Key Ring;The [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_MissionSpot02_Drakan_Gaurd_80_Ae] keeps it under lock and key. It could help [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Dgarung_E] to escape.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_70607a
string.body: Master Key Set;The [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_MissionSpot02_Drakan_Gaurd_80_Ae_Dark] keeps it under lock and key. It might help [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Pogarung_E] to escape.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_62830a
string.body: Kyle's Signal Flare;For tricky moments that decide between life and death. Using the Signal Flare sends a cry for help to Kyle.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_72830a
string.body: Lyle's Signal Flare;For tricky moments that decide between life and death. Using the Signal Flare sends a cry for help to Lyle.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_63017a
string.body: Stella Field Uniform Laundry;A bundle of clothes containing [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Hogda_E]'s used, sweat-soaked field uniform.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_63017b
string.body: Soldier's Locker Key;Contains new Stella field uniforms. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_underOP_Dukabi_E] manages the soldiers' lockers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_63017c
string.body: Stella Field Uniform;A bundle containing a new Stella field uniform. In tribute to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Hogda_E], it's hard to open this bundle.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_coin_ldf8_reward_01
string.body: Stellium;The coinage of the Stella Corporation.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_63400a
string.body: [Event] PvE Hunting Wind Shaving[pl:"Shavings"];Available in all [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_E_Guidemission_PvE_01] of the 'Completed Windstream' which you can view by pressing J in your guide.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_matter_slot_open_c_01
string.body: Slot Stone[pl:"Stones"];Expands the Manastone slots on your equipment. Click on the desired equipment and expand your Manastone slots in the Boost/Modify menu.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_matter_enchant_a_pve
string.body: Ancient PvE Enchantment Stone[pl:"Stones"];Used to enchant PvE equipment which can be upgraded.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_63500a
string.body: [Event] PvP Hunting Wind Shaving[pl:"Shavings"];Available in all PvP Quests of the 'Completed Windstream' which you can view by pressing J in your guide.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_matter_enchant_a_pvp
string.body: Ancient PvP Enchantment Stone[pl:"Stones"];Used to enchant PvP equipment which can be upgraded.

string.name: STR_DIC_material_ldf7_a0_80a
string.body: Genesis Crystal[pl:"Crystals"];A crystal within which Aion's power slumbers. Bring it to the merchant for Genesis Crystals in the Everlasting Life Refuge or in the Temple of Perpetual Wisdom in Lakrum, where you can exchange it for precious items.

string.name: STR_DIC_material_pvp_extract_c_80a
string.body: Fighting Spirit Fragment[pl:"Fragments"];A material for upgrading PvP equipment. You can get it by extracting PvP equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_ldf7_base_matter_enchant_pvp
string.body: Box[pl:"Boxes"] of Ancient PvP Enchantment Stones;Contains Ancient PvP Enchantment Stones. Available from the Administrator for Special Consumables and Genesis Crystals in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_material_pvp_evolve_r2_80a
string.body: Legendary Etium;A material for upgrading PvP equipment. Available on the battlefield and in Altar Siege Battles in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_guidemission_r2_pvp_all
string.body: Windiel's Legendary Equipment Chest[pl:"Chests"];Contains [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Gossip_NPC_Windiel_01]'s equipment. When you open it you receive a box of weapons and an armour set consisting of protective helm, upper body protection, leg protectors, shoulder gear, fist guards and feet protectors to match your class.

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_guidemission_f2_pvp_armor
string.body: Ultimate Silent Black Feather Armour Chest[pl:"Chests"];Contains various pieces of Silent Black Feather armour from which you can choose one piece. You receive this when you complete the steps to receive [Windstream/Finale] Ultimate PvP Equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_basic_a0_80a_01
string.body: Ancient Windrider's Top;You can purchase it in exchange for [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_material_ldf7_a0_80a] from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF7_OP_L_pvp_armor_seller] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_basic_a0_80a_02
string.body: Ancient Windrider's Top;You can purchase it in exchange for [plur][%dic:STR_DIC_material_ldf7_a0_80a] from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF7_OP_D_pvp_armor_seller] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_upgrade_r0_80a_01
string.body: Legendary Windrider's Top;You can get it by upgrading an [%dic:STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_basic_a0_80a_01] with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_ldf7_op_l_item_ugrader] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_upgrade_r0_80a_02
string.body: Legendary Windrider's Top;You can get it by upgrading an [%dic:STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_basic_a0_80a_02] with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_ldf7_op_d_item_ugrader] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_DOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_coin_pandora_01
string.body: Holy Pandora Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];You can get this insignia by carrying out missions for the Pandora Recruitment Office.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_coin_ldf5_r_80a
string.body: Legendary Battle Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];Available in Red Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_coin_ldf5_f_80a
string.body: Ultimate Battle Insignia[pl:"Insignias"];Available in Red Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shop_material_gather_ldf5_80a_L
string.body: Katalam Vitality Extractor[pl:"Extractors"];Available from the Distributors of Special Consumables [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UNITE_LDF5a_op_l_ApSeller], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UNITE_LDF5a_op02_l_ApSeller] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UNITE_LDF5a_op03_l_ApSeller] in Red Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shop_material_gather_ldf5_80a_D
string.body: Katalam Vitality Extractor[pl:"Extractors"];Available from the Distributors of Special Consumables [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UNITE_LDF5a_op_d_ApSeller], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UNITE_LDF5a_op02_d_ApSeller] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UNITE_LDF5a_op03_d_ApSeller] in Red Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_totalworld_playtime_recovery
string.body: Dimension Hourglass[pl:"Hourglasses"];Fill it so that you can be active in Red Katalam.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_D_SOULRING_GIFT
string.body: Soulinerk's Gift[pl:"Gifts"];A little present for those Daevas who have yet to hear any of the rumours coming out of Dumaha.

string.name: STR_WORLD_DMAHA_M_MIND
string.body: Dumaha Distillate[pl:"Distillates"];It contains the essence of Dumaha's light. There's a certain probability that you can use it to get a Dumamond or a Dumallond.

string.name: STR_WORLD_DMAHA_M_DMAHA_ENERGY
string.body: Dumamond[pl:"Dumamonds"];Dumaha's bright light makes this stone shine. There's a certain probability that you'll get a special item for it.

string.name: STR_WORLD_DMAHA_M_DMAHA_LOST_ENERGY
string.body: Dumallond[pl:"Dumallonds"];Dumaha's gentle light makes this stone shimmer. You can trade it for goods from Poumerlinerk.

string.name: STR_DMAHA_MIND_D_ENERGY
string.body: Daevalite[pl:"Daevalites"];A crystal for Daevas who have earned themselves a reward by defeating the enemy faction. Bring it together with the Dumaha Distillate to Soulinerk to get a Kron Dumamond.
